apps.title: Stocks Tracker:Real-time stock
apps.description:
Stocks Tracker - The most comprehensive stock app in the mobile world.  Brings you free streaming live quotes, pre-market/after-hour quotes, portfolio  monitoring, advanced full screen chart, push notification based alert, economic news, event/earnings calendar, market signal scans and a lot more...

Features Highlights:

-Multiple watch lists
-Multiple portfolios
-Support all major US brokers for trading
-Real-time Alerts
-Real-time streaming quotes
-Market single scans
-Global Indexes & Currencies
-Futures & Commodities 
-Stock Screener
-Interactive chart with 50+ technical indicators
-Paper Trade
-News, Events & Earnings

Feature Details:

---------------------------------------------
-== Watchlist and real time quotes ==-
---------------------------------------------
Free real-time streaming quotes, no more refresh, no more 15-20 min delay *
After hour and pre-market price
Create unlimited watchlists
Add unlimited symbols to existing watchlist
Delete/Re-order your watch list and symbols

---------------------------------------------
-== Market single scans ==-
---------------------------------------------
52-week high/low
Strong Volume Gainer/Losser
50/200 MA Crossover
MACD Crossover
RSI Oversold/Overbought
Above/Below Bollinger Band
SAR Buy/Sell
ADX Uptrend/Downtrend
Aroon Uptrend/Downtrend
Gap Up/Down

---------------------------------------------
-== Stock details ==-
---------------------------------------------
Open, previous close, high/low, 54 week high/low, volume/avg volume
Earnings info for up to past 6 quarters
Next earning release date
Add coming earning release date to your calendar
Company news



---------------------------------------------
-== Chart ==-
---------------------------------------------
Simple line/candle chart
1, 5 day, 1,3,6 month and 1,2,5 year chart

apps.title: Emma - Budget Planner Tracker
apps.description:
Meet Emma, your financial super app 

● All your accounts in one place 
● Find and track your subscriptions
● Set budgets
● Weekly reports
● Analyze your spending & expenses
● Daily balance notifications
● Overdraft alerts 

BANK LEVEL SECURITY

Worried about sharing your data? We hear you. 


● Emma uses SSL 256-bit encryption - the same security protocol that banks use - to ensure that your sensitive, personal information is fully encrypted and securely stored.
● Emma uses biometric security authentication for an added level of protection.
 
CUSTOMER REVIEWS

“This app is amazing! I used to manually track my expenses using a notepad or a spreadsheet but always used to make mistakes and never found time to update it. This fixes all my budgeting issues and saves me so much time as well as money!”
Sarah

“I love the fact that I can do everything within this one app. I mainly use it for tracking my expenses but have also started using it to instantly send/receive payments which makes things super easy. Also, the money I’ve saved from using this app is used to invest in my favorite companies using the investment feature!”
Mike

OUR MISSION

We believe everyone deserves a financial advocate to help with money management and budgeting. Someone who watches our back no matter who we are and where we come from. We provide a great experience, which relies on a basic principle - caring about our customers’ financial well being. This is who we are and what we stand for.

We have received amazing feedback from the finance community and have been featured in Forbes, Financial Times, Politico, The Sunday Times and CITY A.M.

MORE FEATURES? GO PLUS, PRO OR ULTIMATE 

We have 3 subscription upgrades available in Emma to power charge your finances. Here’s what is available in each subscription upgrade:

Emma Plus
 
True Balance - preemptively see the balance of your bank account after your subscriptions are removed 
Fraud Detection - find out whether your personal details have been part of a known data breach
Bill Reminders - get reminded about your upcoming bills so you never miss a payment 
Cashback -  get cashback from your favorite brands
 
 
Emma Pro
 
All the features in Emma Plus
Custom categories - so you can customize your finances to your heart's content 
Rename transactions - for easier reference 
Export data - to understand your finances on excel
Create Offline Accounts - to manage your cash expenses and any accounts you can’t link to Emma
Create Smart Rules - to automate your Offline Accounts. Look, no hands! 
Split your transactions - into multiple categories for more flexibility
Legendary Pro Icon - because you are a Pro

Emma Ultimate
 
All the features in Emma Plus & Pro
Spaces - group together different accounts to see separated analytics and budgets 
Ultimate Icon - so you can show them who's boss 
 
-----------------------------------

If you choose to purchase Emma Plus, Emma Pro or Emma Ultimate, payment will be charged to your iTunes account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Subscriptions are managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Apple ID. Emma subscription prices start at $4.99 CAD/USD/month with 1-month and 12-month packages available. Prices are  subject to change without notice. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. If you don’t choose to purchase Emma Plus, Emma or Emma Ultimate, you can simply continue using Emma for free.

Emma Technologies LTD is registered with the Financial Conduct Authority under the Payment Services Regulations 2017 for the provision of payment services. Reference no. 794952

Company Registration Number: 10578464.

Terms and Conditions: https://emma-app.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://emma-app.com/privacy

apps.title: SoLo Funds: Lend & Borrow
apps.description:
Access up to $625 on your own terms or supply funds to make a social impact and return.
 
Fun fact → SoLo Funds is a Certified Public Benefit Corporation.
 
SoLo is a community finance platform where our members step up for one another. We enable financial services for real people, powered by people. We back each other because we believe in each other.

Here’s why thousands of members use SoLo…

ACCESS UP TO $625 ON YOUR OWN TERMS
We give you choice and control where others don't. No credit checks. We come through for each other because we're in this together.

EARN MONEY WHILE HELPING OTHERS
SoLo is a great way to make a social impact while also earning a return on your money. Our data driven tools allow you to verify and make smarter choices. Fund a request today. We’re people helping people.

Fun fact → SoLo is a 2023 CNBC Disruptor 50 Company

SOLO PROTECTION
We’re in this together. We protect each member in our community via secure and easy communication between bank accounts while creating a safety net for potential losses.
 
Fun fact → SoLo was selected as one of Fast Company’s World Changing ideas in 2022

SOLO WALLET
Leverage our banking solution to build financial autonomy. Deposit, withdrawal, and bank with SoLo.

Fun fact → SoLo won NBCUniversal’s LIFTOff Financial Impact Challenge

NO HIDDEN FEES
We’re not here to surprise you with fees. SoLo guarantees no hidden fees, no minimum balance fees, transactions fees, expedition fees and no overdraft fees.

GET MONEY UNIVERSITY
We believe that access to information is the key to building strong financial habits. Take courses, learn, and share this free resource with others.

Fun fact → SoLo was selected in 2021 for Global Inclusive Fintech 50 by the Center for Financial Inclusion

SoLo Funds, Inc, a Certified Benefit Corporation, is not a bank. Banking services provided by Bangor Savings Bank, Member FDIC. TheSoLo Funds Mastercard® Debit Card is issued by Bangor Savings Bank, Member FDIC, pursuant to license by Mastercard International Incorporated. Mastercard is a registered trademark, and the circle design is a trademark of Mastercard International Incorporated. Spend anywhere Mastercard is accepted.

For more information please visit our website https://solofunds.com/.
(1) $625 Cash Requests: Criteria applies, see Terms https://solofunds.com/terms/ for more details.
(2) SoLo Wallet: The bank services are provided by Bangor Savings Bank, Member FDIC.

All loans regardless of the early schedule payment have the same terms, with 90 days for repayments and default. The early repayment schedule for a loan request can differ between members with all loans up to 90 days to pay in full until defaulted. Your initial scheduled early repayment date can be skipped without issue and repaid manually in-app at any time with minimum and maximum repayment schedule up to 90 days. All loans have up to 90 days to pay in full until defaulted.

See SoLo's Privacy Policy https://solofunds.com/privacy

apps.title: Toss - Make finance easier
apps.description:
Download the Toss app to use Toss Bank and Toss Securities

● Get a full overview of your finances at a glance
- Manage all your accounts—savings, installment deposits, housing subscriptions, investments, and loans—conveniently in one place with Toss.
- Stay on top of your income, spending, and card spending requirements.
- Easily track monthly bills, insurance payments, subscriptions with no extra effort.

● Safe, simple, and fee-free transfers
- Transfer fees are free for life at Toss, no matter which bank you use.
- Scan for scam & fraud accounts in advance to safely send money.

● Banking reinvented for you
- Even one day is enough to start earning interest with a Toss Bank account.
- Get interest in advance with a Toss Bank account—before it matures.
- Easily get a debit card you can use abroad with no foreign transaction fees.

● Instantly look up your loan options
- Compare loan offers from 75 different financial institutions—including 16 from the banking sector—in under a minute.
- Enjoy special promotions like 1-year interest support and more.

● Smart insurance recommendations tailored to you
- Find out what coverage you're missing compared to your peers and get personalized suggestions.
- Submit a medical bill claim and get reimbursements without the hassle of paper work

● Investing made simple for everyone
- Simple terms anyone can understand.
- Get curated news on stocks you follow.
- Share information in the community or get tips from top investors.

● Users can now use Toss in English
- Toss is now available in English.
- To use Toss in English, change your language settings to English.

● Accessibility Features Supported
- The VoiceOver feature can be enabled for screen reading.
- Text size can be increased, and the screen can be zoomed in for easier viewing.
- High contrast and color-independent display options make the screen easier to view.
- The app is optimized for Dark Mode as well.

● Toss is operated by Viva Republica
Viva Republica, a leading fintech company in Korea, is officially registered as an electronic financial business under Article 28 of the Electronic Financial Transactions Act. The company earned this designation after passing security and monitoring inspections by the Financial Supervisory Service and receiving approval from the Financial Services Commission. In 2019, Viva Republica was ranked 29th on the "Top 100 Fintech Companies in the World" list by KPMG and H2 Ventures. Today, it holds more official partnerships with banks and securities firms than any other fintech company in Korea.

● Toss only asks for required permissions
You can use the app without granting the optional permissions, though some feature may not be available. Here's what each option permission is used for.

[Optional permissions]
- Contact: contact transfers, profile photo upload
- Notifications: sending notifications, receiving ARS verification code
- Camera: Reading and uploading QR codes, cards, and ID cards
- Photos: storing and uploading photo
- Location: detecting current locating and preventing fraudulent transactions
- Motion & Fitness: tracking steps (for Toss Walk)
- Face ID: secure login without a PIN
- Bluetooth: find and connect to nearby devices
- Tracking: viewing results of "This week's mission"

● Accessibility Features Supported
· The VoiceOver feature can be enabled for screen reading.
 · Text size can be increased, and the screen can be zoomed in for easier viewing.
 · High contrast and color-independent display options make the screen easier to view.
 · The app is optimized for Dark Mode as well.

● Toss is open 24/7, 365
- Phone number 1599-4905
- KakaoTalk @toss
- Email support@toss.im

apps.title: baha: Stocks, Markets & News
apps.description:
All US and international markets information you need covered in one innovative app.
Get access to free live quotes and price alerts from markets around the world, as well as historical data, breaking global stories from our newsroom, company profiles, full screen real-time charts, stock screener, currency converter and much more. Full personalization possible with custom watchlists, portfolios and price-based push alerts.
App designed for private users, professional use not allowed without authorization.

REAL-TIME DATA & LIVE SEARCH
- Live quotes with push prices - no manual reloading of the data is necessary!
- Powerful live search featuring our huge data universe - look up your individual symbols 
- Current news updates for global events 
- Covers markets around the world (stocks, futures, indices, commodities, currencies…)

PRE-DEFINED MARKET OVERVIEWS & EXTENSIVE DETAIL PAGES
- Overviews of most popular symbols for Markets, Commodities, Indices, Currencies, Interest Rates, Hot Stocks
- Extensive detail view for each symbol based on symbol type (stock, commodity, currency etc.) 
- Arbitrage lists: View a symbol on different markets
- Company profiles & company news for stocks
- Related futures/options for a symbol

PORTFOLIO
- Multiple personal portfolios to keep track of your gains and losses
- Define the starting capital, portfolio currency,  fees, deposits and redemptions  
- Add / remove symbols with simulated buy/sell transactions (incl. fees & comments)
- Show profit/loss per position and for complete portfolio
- Share your portfolio with our other mobile apps (e.g. for iPad) 

PERSONAL WATCHLISTS
- Customisable price lists for monitoring your assets
- Real-time prices with many display options (Last & Change%, Performance View, QuoteBoard, Chart View and more)

REAL-TIME PUSH ALERTS
- Automatically triggered price-based notifications
- Daily e-mail notifications about a customised list of securities 
- Alerts sent automatically by Apple Push 
- E-mail alerts and text messages

ADVANCED REAL-TIME CHARTING & TECHNICAL ANALYSIS
- Track price movements on our interactive full screen charts 
- Candlesticks, OHLC Bars, Mountain or Line charts (incl. Volume)
- Timeframes: Daily, Weekly, Monthly or Intraday (1 / 5 / 10 / 15 / 30 / 60 Minutes)
- Linear, percentage or logarithmic scaling available
- Additional features like zooming, crosshair, chart templates, benchmark comparison 
- Supports the most popular indicators for technical analysis, like Moving Average, ADX, Average True Range, Bollinger Bands, CCI, Directional Movement Plus/Minus, DM System, Envelopes, Highest High, Lowest Low, Ichimoku, MACD, Momentum, Money Flow Index, OBV, Price Change, Parabolic SAR, ROC, TRIX, Volatility, RSI,...

STOCK SCREENER 
- Easy picking of the most promising securities out of thousands 
- Covering the world's major stock exchanges 
- Performance filters (Change %, Performance 1 Week, 1 Month, 3 Months, 6 Months,1 Year, 3 Years, 5 Years, 10 Years)
- Fundamental filters like market cap, EBIT, EBITDA, net income & turnover

CURRENCY CONVERTER
- Easy-to-use calculator using current rates from major world currencies (also includes Bitcoin)
- Online and offline

MARKET COVERAGE
- Major Stock markets & Indices, like Nasdaq, Dow Jones, S&P 500, S&P 100, FTSE 100, DAX, EuroStoxx 50, Nikkei 225 etc.
- Commodities markets, incl. precious metals (gold, silver, platinum, palladium, copper), energy, agricultural and livestock products
- Futures / Options markets, for example CME, CBOT etc.
- Major Currency pairs, such as EUR/USD, GBP/USD, USD/JPY etc. as well as Bitcoin rates (BTC/USD) 
-  Interest Rates, Bonds, ETFs
-  Free real-time data (where available) 
-  Additional real-time data packages from your baha Terminal accounts

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

- Share your portfolio with our other mobile apps (e.g. for iPad) 

PERSONAL WATCHLISTS
- Customisable price lists for monitoring your assets
- Real-time prices with many display options (Last & Change%, Performance View, QuoteBoard, Chart View and more)

REAL-TIME PUSH ALERTS
- Automatically triggered price-based notifications
- Daily e-mail notifications about a customised list of securities 
- Alerts sent automatically by Apple Push 
- E-mail alerts and text messages

ADVANCED REAL-TIME CHARTING & TECHNICAL ANALYSIS
- Track price movements on our interactive full screen charts 
- Candlesticks, OHLC Bars, Mountain or Line charts (incl. Volume)
- Timeframes: Daily, Weekly, Monthly or Intraday (1 / 5 / 10 / 15 / 30 / 60 Minutes)
- Linear, percentage or logarithmic scaling available
- Additional features like zooming, crosshair, chart templates, benchmark comparison 
- Supports the most popular indicators for technical analysis, like Moving Average, ADX, Average True Range, Bollinger Bands, CCI, Directional Movement Plus/Minus, DM System, Envelopes, Highest High, Lowest Low, Ichimoku, MACD, Momentum, Money Flow Index, OBV, Price Change, Parabolic SAR, ROC, TRIX, Volatility, RSI,...

STOCK SCREENER 
- Easy picking of the most promising securities out of thousands 
- Covering the world's major stock exchanges 
- Performance filters (Change %, Performance 1 Week, 1 Month, 3 Months, 6 Months,1 Year, 3 Years, 5 Years, 10 Years)
- Fundamental filters like market cap, EBIT, EBITDA, net income & turnover

CURRENCY CONVERTER
- Easy-to-use calculator using current rates from major world currencies (also includes Bitcoin)
- Online and offline

MARKET COVERAGE
- Major Stock markets & Indices, like Nasdaq, Dow Jones, S&P 500, S&P 100, FTSE 100, DAX, EuroStoxx 50, Nikkei 225 etc.
- Commodities markets, incl. precious metals (gold, silver, platinum, palladium, copper), energy, agricultural and livestock products
- Futures / Options markets, for example CME, CBOT etc.
- Major Currency pairs, such as EUR/USD, GBP/USD, USD/JPY etc. as well as Bitcoin rates (BTC/USD) 
-  Interest Rates, Bonds, ETFs
-  Free real-time data (where available) 
-  Additional real-time data packages from your baha Terminal accounts

apps.title: Lili - Small Business Finances
apps.description:
Lili is a business finance platform that enables small businesses to manage all aspects of their finances in one place. With business banking, smart bookkeeping, unlimited invoices & payments, and tax preparation tools–you’ll always know where your business stands.


BUSINESS BANKING

- Business Checking Account
- Lili Visa® Debit Card*
- Mobile Check Deposit
- Fee-free ATM withdrawals at 38K locations
- Cash Deposit at 90k participating retailers
- Get paid up to 2 days early
- No minimum balance or deposit required
- No hidden fees
- Automatic Savings
- Cashback Awards**
- Fee-free Overdraft up to $200**
- Savings Account with 3.00% APY****


ACCOUNTING SOFTWARE**

- Expense management tools and reports
- Income & expense insights***
- Attach receipts to expenses with a quick photo from your phone
- On-demand reporting including profit & loss and cash flow statements***


TAX PREPARATION**

- Automatic labeling of transactions into tax categories
- Write-off tracker
- Automated tax savings
- Pre-filled business tax forms (including Forms 1065, 1120, and Schedule C)***


INVOICING SOFTWARE***

- Create and send customized invoices
- Accept all payment methods
- Track unpaid invoices and send payment reminders


SUPPORT FOR YOUR BUSINESS

- Lili Academy: Videos and guides that cover all aspects of running a small business
- Free tools, downloadable resources, long-form guides and blog articles
- Discounts on relevant tools from our partners
- Curated newsletters and business-related content


ACCOUNT SECURITY YOU CAN RELY ON

All Lili accounts are insured up to $250,000 through our partner bank, Sunrise Banks, N.A., Member FDIC. Lili business accounts and debit cards are protected by industry-leading encryption software and security protocols, including fraud monitoring and multi-factor authentication. Lili customers receive transaction alerts in real-time, can access their account from mobile or desktop anytime and instantly freeze their card if needed.


LEGAL DISCLOSURES

Lili is a financial technology company, not a bank. Banking services are provided by Sunrise Banks N.A., Member FDIC

*The Lili Visa® Debit Card is issued by Sunrise Banks, N.A., Member FDIC, pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. Please see the back of your Card for its issuing bank. The Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

**Available to Lili Pro, Lili Smart, and Lili Premium account holders only, applicable monthly account fee applies.

***Available to Lili Smart and Lili Premium account holders only, applicable monthly account fee applies.

****The Annual Percentage Yield (“APY”) for the Lili Savings Account is variable and may change at any time. The disclosed APY is effective as of January 1, 2025. Must have at least $0.01 in savings to earn interest. The APY applies to balances of up to and including $1,000,000. Any portions of a balance over $1,000,000 will not earn interest or have a yield. Available to Lili Pro, Lili Smart, and Lili Premium account holders only.

apps.title: 新浪财经-新闻与资讯热点平台
apps.developer: Beijing Sina Finance Information Service Co., Ltd.
apps.description:
新浪财经APP是一款全面而深度的财经信息服务平台软件，致力于为广大投资者提供最新、最全、最专业的财经信息和金融市场行情。我们的产品服务包括：
1. 财经新闻：新浪财经拥有20余年专注财经新闻报道的丰富经验，资深编辑团队7*24小时不间断为您追踪国内外金融动态，政策风向及股票重大情报，确保您把握每一个投资良机。
2. 股票市场：股票市场覆盖面广泛，包括A股、港股、美股、英股、ETF、债券、全球股指、MSCI指数等，涵盖全球30多个国家、40多个市场。
3. 期货市场：接入国内外全部主流期货品种，涵盖100多种期货产品，如A50、黄金、原油、玉米、大豆等，提供功能全面、响应迅速且准确稳定的行情服务。提供全市场期货短视频信息汇总、以及国内品种持仓分析工具，追踪热门品种，热门期货公司席位变化。
4. 外汇市场：提供全球150多个国家和地区的货币实时行情，涵盖美元指数、在岸及离岸人民币、欧元、英镑、港币、日元等，同时提供国内各大银行的实时外汇牌价和购汇/结汇比价服务。
5. 特色功能：
* 自选股：支持将所有品种加入自选，功能丰富，包括浮窗盯盘、分时预览、多股对比、分组管理和股价提醒等，是广大用户信赖的盯盘利器。
* 资金流向：实时追踪大盘、个股、指数、板块的资金轨迹，及时跟踪北向资金流向，是投资者洞悉主力动向的必备工具。
* 海量数据：全面丰富的金融数据与投研工具，包括基础行情、个股资料、财务数据、龙虎榜、市场概览等。
* 模拟交易：提供A股、港股、美股、期货等市场模拟交易练习场及各类比赛，与投资高手在线切磋，共同学习进步。
* 指数地图：一目了然地展示全球主要市场的实时行情，并对比全球各类资产的收益率，让全球投资尽收眼底。
* 智能预警：实时推送全市场重要财经信息、股票异动、重大公告及机构研报，助您及时作出响应。
* ESG：提供权威、全面的ESG资讯、评级、电子月刊、峰会及论坛等内容，是获取ESG相关信息的首选平台。
新浪财经，为您打破信息不对称，让投资变得更简单！
【联系我们】北京市海淀区西北旺东路10号院西区8号楼新浪总部大厦
【官方网站】https://finance.sina.com.cn
【官方微博】https://weibo.com/finance
【QQ 群】 537206810
【客服电话】 4006-900-000
【客服邮箱】sinacsc@vip.sina.com

apps.title: ONE@Work (formerly Even)
apps.description:
ONE@Work (formerly Even) partners with leading employers, like Walmart, to provide simple tools that help you take control of your pay — without the hassle.

Through ONE@Work, you can: 

- Get paid early* – With Instapay, access your net earnings before payday to help cover the unexpected. No fees** or hidden interest.

- Track your earnings – See your work schedule and track how much you’ll make per shift and per paycheck – no more guesswork.**

- Save automatically – Choose a percentage you want to save and we’ll deduct it from your paycheck automatically.

- Budget easily – When you connect your bank account, ONE@Work helps you calculate what’s okay to spend.


ONE@Work is only available as an employer-provided benefit. 

ONE@Work Save is powered by Cross River Bank, Member FDIC or Coastal Community Bank, Member FDIC.


* Instapay is currently unavailable for Walmart  associates in NY. 

**  Only available for members whose employers have configured this benefit within the app.

apps.title: eFinancialCareers: Jobs + News
apps.description:
Manage your career with the world’s leading financial services career website, eFinancialCareers. Whether you are actively looking for a job or managing your career, our app has everything you need: access to thousands of top employers, over 10,000 jobs across the globe, industry news, and career advice. 

App highlights:
- Search for jobs without an account –  then register to save or apply
- Create your profile entirely from within the app
- One-click apply option for select jobs
- Filters help you find just what you're looking for
- Profile synching across devices

Detailed features:
- Create a profile: Create a new profile or sign in with your existing account so recruiters can easily find you.
- Add resumes and cover letters: Upload different resume and cover letter options from a cloud service of choice such as iCloud or DropBox and access them anytime.
- Search for jobs: Refine your search based on filters such as location, job title, or skills to find your perfect match.
- Save jobs & create alerts: With a profile, you can save jobs to review them later or set up of job alerts and have new opportunities sent directly to you.
- Read news and career advice: Keep up to date with all the latest financial services news and how it impacts your career.

apps.title: Upstart: Personal Loans + More
apps.description:
Get the money you need sent in as fast as 24 hours¹. Upstart makes borrowing simple, fast, and transparent. Check your rate in minutes, with no impact to your credit score²  ‒trusted by 3M+ borrowers³ and rated 4.9 stars.⁴  Apply for fixed-rate loans from $500 to $75,000.⁵ 

Lightning Fast Approvals
• 90% of funded borrowers received their approvals instantly⁶ — no paperwork required
• Funding in as fast as one business day after approval⁷
• Find out if you qualify in minutes

Flexible Loan Options
• Personal loans: $1K - $75K⁵ for almost anything
• Auto refinancing: Lower your monthly car payment
• Short-term relief loans: For everyday bills and expenses
• Debt consolidation: Combine multiple debts into one easy payment

What You Can Do in the App
• Check your rate without impacting your credit score² 
• Compare loan options side-by-side
• Track your application status in real-time
• Manage your loan and make payments on the go
• Get prequalified for future loans
• Access customer support 24/7

Why 3+ Million Borrowers Choose Upstart³
• Top rated with industry-leading customer satisfaction
• No hidden fees — transparent pricing from day one
• Personalized rates based on your unique financial profile

About Upstart:
Upstart is the partner millions trust to borrow better. We connect customers with our network of banks and credit unions and offer competitive rates. With loan options for personal use, debt consolidation, and auto refinancing, our fixed rates and flexible loan terms make it easy for borrowers to choose Upstart again and again. Plus, we don’t charge prepayment fees. We’re here for you every step of the way with a live, helpful Customer Service team, and easy access to common Help Center FAQs.

LEGAL DISCLAIMERS:
¹In June 2025, 65% of Upstart customers had the funds transfer initiated in 24 hours upon approval and signing the promissory note. When the funds will be available to you will depend on your bank’s policies.

²This initial (soft) inquiry will not affect your credit score. If you accept your rate and proceed with your application, we do another (hard) credit inquiry that will impact your credit score. If you take out a loan, repayment information may be reported to the credit bureaus.

³As of 6/30/2025, across Upstart’s marketplace.

⁴As of 6/30/2025 for Upstart on Trustpilot.com

⁵Your loan amount will be determined based on your credit, income, and certain other information provided in your loan application. Not all applicants will qualify for the full amount. Minimal loan amounts for the personal loans product vary by state: GA ($3,100), HI ($2,100), MA ($7,000).

⁶The majority of unsecured loan borrowers on the Upstart marketplace are able to receive an instant decision upon submitting a completed application, without providing additional supporting documents; final approval is conditioned upon passing the hard credit inquiry. Loan processing may be subject to longer wait times if additional documentation is required for review.

⁷If you accept your loan by 5pm EST (not including weekends or holidays), your funds will be sent on the next business day. When the funds will be available to you will depend on your bank’s policies.

⁸Estimated based on all consumers who were approved for an auto loan through the Upstart platform. In June 2025, the average monthly payment savings amount was $131. To evaluate savings on a loan you are considering refinancing, it is important to compare your APR and remaining term from your existing auto loan to the APR and term offered through Upstart.

⁹In June 2025, 70% of funded borrowers that signed their promissory note before 11AM PST/2PM EST (not including weekends or holidays) had the funds transfer initiated same day. When the funds will be available to you will depend on your bank’s transaction processing time and policies.

Upstart Network, Inc. NMLS #936133. Upstart is not the lender. All loans on Upstart's marketplace are made by regulated financial institutions.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
What's new:
- UX improvements
- Better stability

Are there any features you would like to see in the future? We are always listening and working hard behind the scenes, please email us at mobile@upstart.com

Loan processing may be subject to longer wait times if additional documentation is required for review.

⁷If you accept your loan by 5pm EST (not including weekends or holidays), your funds will be sent on the next business day. When the funds will be available to you will depend on your bank’s policies.

⁸Estimated based on all consumers who were approved for an auto loan through the Upstart platform. In June 2025, the average monthly payment savings amount was $131. To evaluate savings on a loan you are considering refinancing, it is important to compare your APR and remaining term from your existing auto loan to the APR and term offered through Upstart.

⁹In June 2025, 70% of funded borrowers that signed their promissory note before 11AM PST/2PM EST (not including weekends or holidays) had the funds transfer initiated same day. When the funds will be available to you will depend on your bank’s transaction processing time and policies.

Upstart Network, Inc. NMLS #936133. Upstart is not the lender. All loans on Upstart's marketplace are made by regulated financial institutions.

apps.title: Derayah Global
apps.description:
تتيح منصة دراية جلوبل لعملائنا إمكانية متابعة الأسعار الفورية وإنشاء قوائم المتابعة للأسهم وصناديق المؤشرات المتداولة (ETF) وعقود الخيارات التي تهمهم، كما تتيح لعملائنا تنفيذ أوامرهم حول أكثر من بورصة حول العالم بأفضل أسعار التنفيذ لكل أمر، وإمكانية إرسال الأوامر عبر الانترنت، أو عبر تطبيق الهاتف الذكي، أو عبر الاتصال بأحد وسطاء دراية.

The Derayah Global platform allows our clients to monitor live prices and create personal watch lists of stocks, Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs) and Options. It also allows our customers to execute each of their orders in one or more stock exchange around the world at the best executions prices available. Orders may be submitted online, through the smartphone application, or by calling one of Derayah’s brokers.

apps.title: Principal®
apps.description:
Keep up with your financial goals on the go.

The updated Principal® app makes it easy to keep on top of your retirement savings and gain insights to help you reach your financial goals. Download and use the app to:
 
•	Complete simple transactions and quick check-ins: view account balances, roll over funds, change contributions, adjust investments, and more
•	Discover financial education to help build your confidence and make progress in budgeting, saving, debt payoff, and more
•	Learn from tools like our personalized Retirement Wellness Score to see how you’re tracking toward your retirement goals

The availability of information and functionality will vary depending on your plan type(s).

apps.title: First Horizon Mobile Banking
apps.description:
Now available for both Personal and Small Business customers!  The First Horizon Mobile Banking app is free to download and offers you a convenient, secure way to manage your financial life or your business on the go. The app lets you deposit a check, view your account balances, pay bills, transfer funds, create and manage budgets, track spending, and set timely alerts and notifications to keep you in the know.

Service Features

• Enable Quick Glance℠ to check balances and see recent transactions without logging in
• Set alerts and push notifications to your iPhone®, Apple Watch®, or iPad®
• Turn your debit and credit cards on or off
• Deposit checks with Mobile Deposit
• Check your account balances and view recent transactions
• Transfer funds between eligible accounts at any time
• Pay bills, add payees, see payments made, or cancel payments
• Send, Request, and Split money with family, friends, and people you know and trust with Zelle® using your personal bank account.
• Move money between all of your personal bank accounts – even ones at other banks
• Create budgets, designate savings goals, and track progress
• Find the nearest First Horizon ATM or banking center

Service Benefits

• Convenience – Bank wherever you go and at any time of the day
• Control – It’s easy to monitor your account and quickly move money, pay bills, and turn your card on or off
• Support – A dedicated mobile specialist is just a quick call away
• Security – Enjoy the highest level of protection against account fraud

How to Get Started

Simply download the app, use your Digital Banking credentials to log in, and you’re ready to begin banking on the go.

apps.title: سلفة
apps.description:
سلفة شركة تمويل من خلال التقنية المالية تتوافق عملياتها مع أحكام الشريعة الإسلامية وتقدم تطبيق للتمويل الطارئ والسريع للأفراد على مدار الساعة ويستغرق الإيداع للتمويل 24 ساعة فقط على أي بنك أو مصرف داخل المملكة العربية السعودية ـ بحيث يمكن طلب مبالغ تمويلية صغيرة تتراوح ما بين 1,000 ريال إلى 25,000 ريال- وفترة سداد تصل إلى 24 شهر وبطريقة سهله. يمكنك طلب التمويل من أي مكان في المملكة العربية السعودية عبر تطبيق سلفة.

لماذا تعتبر سلفة للتمويل الأفضل في تمويل الأفراد؟
طلب التمويل بطريقة إلكترونية بالكامل
تمويل فوري وسريع على مدار الساعة
متوافق مع أحكام الشريعة الإسلامية
بدون تحويل راتب أو كفيل أو حضور
فترة سداد مرنة تصل إلى 24 شهرًا
إيداع التمويل على أي بنك أو مصرف

وكذلك بإمكان الأفراد المستثمرين الاستثمار عبر تمويل أفراد آخرين من خلال سوق التمويل في تطبيق سلفة والحصول على عوائد مالية مغرية جراء الاستثمار في التمويل والذي يوزع بشكل شهري وبنسب عالية الربحية. حيث يعتبر هذا النوع للتمويل بين الأفراد جذاب حيث يستطيع الفرد أن يسلف فرد آخر ويحصل على توزيعات شهرية مغرية وبمبالغ استثمارية صغيرة تبدأ من 100 ريال فقط! 

سلفة تساعد الأفراد على تلبية وإتمام احتياجاتهم الطارئة والمستعجلة. تستخدم سلفة التكنولوجيا المالية لغرض تطوير الخدمات المالية وتسهيل التعاملات وسرعة اتخاذ القرار، بالإضافة إلى إمكان وتحسين الخدمات المالية لمستوى أفضل.

 شركة سلفة هي شركة  مساهمة مغلقة تعمل تحت إشراف ورقابة البنك المركزي السعودي بسجل تجاري رقم 1010577762 وتعتبر الشركة الأولى في تقديم التمويل الإستهلاكي المصغر للأفراد عبر التقنية المالية (Fintech) وكذلك تعتبر أول منصة للتمويل الجماعي بين الأفراد.

الموقع الالكتروني: www.Sulfah.com
حسابنا على تويتر: https://twitter.com/sulfah

حمل التطبيق الآن ..

raw_data.releaseNotes: سلفة سهلت العمليات لتمويل الأفراد من خلال أتمتة وتسريع الطلبات. وكذلك فعلت التمويل الآلي للمستثمرين وحسنت الفرص في سوق التمويل وإجراءات توزيع الأرباح للمستثمرين.

apps.title: FloatMe: Online Cash Advance
apps.description:
Meet FloatMe, your Best Financial Friend designed to help you get, manage, and save money. Get fast cash advances directly to your bank account by becoming a member.* ‍No credit checks. No interest. No request for tips ever. Repay when you get paid or can afford it.

FLOATS / CASH ADVANCES**
Pay bills, get gas, or buy groceries with cash advances. FloatMe helps you unlock your earned but unpaid wages fast with Floats. Download the app today and connect your bank account to get started. Once you're a member, request Floats be delivered to your bank account in 3 days or less. Need funds immediately? We'll expedite your Instant Float within minutes for a small fee.**

First time approval amounts range from $10-$50. Not all members will qualify and many will not qualify for the maximum amount right away.

BUDGET TOOLS & INSIGHTS
Explore easy-to-use money management tools that come with your membership, including a smart look ahead with the cash flow calendar. FloatMe calculates your likely available balance based on your recurring expenses and projected paydays. 

LOW BALANCE ALERTS
Know where your bank balance is at all times. With low balance alerts, we'll let you know when your funds are getting low, to help you avoid those pesky overdraft fees.

MARKETPLACE OFFERS
Click on easy ways to earn money, like taking an online survey. Explore financial products from our growing list of partners. We find deals and offers to provide to our budget-minded FloatMe members. 

SECURELY CONNECT
FloatMe uses Plaid Portal to securely connect your bank accounts with 256-bit bank-level security to keep your information safe. Plaid seamlessly works with over 10,000 banking institutions across the US. We do not support prepaid cards.

ABOUT US
FloatMe launched in early 2020 with a mission to guide millions of Americans to achieve financial prosperity. We accomplish this by bridging small cash gaps with Floats and providing access to budget management tools.

MEMBERSHIP
* Membership costs $4.99/month and provides access to FloatMe's suite of financial products and services. Subscription fee is auto-renewed every month unless canceled. You can cancel anytime in-app or by contacting our support team at support@floatme.com

Questions? You can contact us through our support portal at www.floatme.com/support

** Cash Advances:
Membership is required to request cash advances; approval of your request is not guaranteed. Membership costs $4.99/month and provides access to FloatMe's suite of financial products and services. Not available in all states. Advances are NOT loans and have no mandatory min or max repayment period. FloatMe's advance service is not a loan nor is it a contracted obligation to repay a loan. We are NOT a payday loan, cash loan, or personal loan app, nor an app to borrow money. Money advanced has 0% max interest. 0% APR. Instant Float fees are not included in the monthly membership cost and are optional. Instant transfer fees vary from $1-$7.

Example 1: If you accept a $50 Cash Advance to your external account via ACH, there is a $0 transfer fee and your total repayment amount will be $50.

Example 2: If you accept a $50 Cash Advance to your external account using the optional instant delivery for a $5 delivery fee, then your total repayment amount will be $55.

Cash Advances or "Floats" are not available to Connecticut, District of Columbia, and Nevada residents.

FloatMe is not affiliated with Credit Karma, Kikoff Credit Builder Loan, Brigit, Credit One, Credit Strong, Albert, Earnin, Dave Bank, Chime, Cleo, Klover, MoneyLion, Empower, Cash Now App, Venmo, Self, Rocket Money, or Possible Finance

Privacy Policy: https://www.floatme.com/privacy-policy
Terms & Conditions: https://www.floatme.com/terms

FloatMe, Corp
110 E Houston St. 7th Floor
San Antonio, TX 78205

apps.title: OPay-We are beyond Banking
apps.description:
OPay is Nigeria's trusted financial services platform, offering secure, fast, reliable, and affordable solutions for all payment needs. With OPay, you can:
 • Send and receive money instantly with seamless transfers and a 100% success rate.
 • Pay bills and top-up airtime & data with exclusive bonuses.
 • Grow your savings easily with daily interest on your balance.
 • Enjoy hassle-free debit cards at zero charges.
 • Access flexible loans with low interest rates.
Unlock convenience, savings, and rewards—all in one app. Invite friends and earn instant cashback for each referral. Open your OPay account today and experience financial freedom.

HASSLE-FREE AND INSTANT TRANSFERS
● Say goodbye to transaction failures & network issues. Enjoy super-fast and successful transactions.
● Send money using a phone number or bank account to others, including non-OPay users.
● Powered by all Nigerian banks: Access Bank, Zenith Bank, GT Bank, UBA Bank, Ecobank Nigeria, First Bank of Nigeria etc., ensuring a seamless and secure banking experience for all our users.
● Keep track of every transfer. Easily find transaction details in your "Transaction History."

BEST AIRTIME/DATA DEALS & EASY BILL PAYMENTS
● Get top airtime and data offers on MTN, Airtel, Glo, and 9Mobile.
● Pay electricity, TV, water bills, internet services and more with ease.
● Earn up to 6% cashback on airtime and data purchases.

OPay DEBIT CARD
● Secure & Reliable: Chip & PIN technology with industry-leading multi-level risk prevention.
● Convenience: Apply via the OPay app with nationwide delivery options or visit any OPay agent store.
● Wide Acceptance: Accepted across POS/ATM/WEB in Nigeria and international merchants like Microsoft, Netflix, AliExpress, Uber, Spotify and Emirates.
● User-Friendly Management: Change PINs, set limits, block/unblock cards, and access card details in-app.
● Virtual Card Option: For secure online payments, get a virtual card instantly via the app.

GROW AND SAVE MORE MONEY  (Powered by BlueRidge Microfinance Bank)
● OWealth: Earn daily interest, with free deposits and withdrawals anytime.
● Spend & Save: Save a percentage of your spending and earn daily returns.
● Fixed Savings: Lock idle funds for at least 7 days to earn higher returns.
● Target Saving: Save towards specific goals with daily, weekly, or monthly plans.
● SafeBox: Start a strict savings plan with limited withdrawals and monthly interest.

SECURE AND PRIVATE
● Advanced features like biometric login, card locking, and encryption for all transactions.
● Block your account or card via USSD (955*131# or 955*132#).
● NightGuard security feature: Extra facial verification feature to authorise transactions during the chosen night time hours.
● Large Transaction Shield feature: Extra facial verification feature for transactions above your pre-set limit.
● Real-time notifications for account activity.
● Private Mode to hide your balance.
● Licensed by the CBN and insured by the NDIC.

OPay is licensed by Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN, https://www.cbn.gov.ng/PaymentsSystem/PSPs.html), and insured by Nigeria Deposit Insurance Corporation  (NDIC, https://ndic.gov.ng/list-of-insured-institutions/list-of-mobile-money-operators/).

apps.title: PalmPay - Transfers, Bills
apps.description:
PalmPay: The Smarter Way to Bank!
- Trusted by millions of Nigerian users for seamless money transfers and payments.
- Enjoy seamless and unlimited Free Transfers to all banks.
- Easy to sign up with your phone number and get mind-blowing Rewards.
- Enjoy a FREE ATM card with zero maintenance fee.
- Explore exclusive data bundles such as social and campus plans. 
- Invest flexibly and earn up to 40% year return with a diverse range of financial products including savings, mutual funds, and insurance!
- 24/7 Customer Support is always available for you.
------------------------------------------------------------------
PalmPay is an intuitive financial app with account opening, money transfer, and bill payments in one. PalmPay is worthy of your trust based on its safety and reliability. And it is fully licensed and regulated as a Mobile Money Operator by the Central Bank of Nigeria, insured by the NDIC, and trusted by millions of users. 
With over 500 cooperation partners, PalmPay supports all scenarios you want to pay. You can get benefits in PalmPay APP, including amazing coupons, free transfer chances, cashback or discount on transaction, etc. Download, and join us now.
 
1. Transfer
- Unlimited Free Transfers to all banks.
- Instant transfer to over 500 financial institutions.
2.PalmPay ATM Card
- Apply via the app or obtain it instantly at a local card agent. 
- Enjoy zero maintenance fee and zero SMS alerts fee. 
- Accepted everywhere - usable at any POS, ATM, and online channel.
3.Data Bundle
- Purchase data bundles quickly and securely anytime. 
- Explore exclusive plans such as MTN Social Bundles, GLO Campus Bundles, and Airtel 6X Voice Bundles. 
4.Airtime
- Recharge instantly on MTN, Airtel, GLO, T2 Mobile (9Mobile), and Smile. 
- Top up in seconds, anytime, anywhere. 
- Stay connected with Airtime Auto-Renew - recharge automatically and avoid downtime. 
5.Wealth
- Cashbox: a versatile savings wallet with an impressive annual interest rate of up to 20%.
- SmartEarn: offers an exceptional 22% annualized interest rate alongside 24/7 instant withdrawals, with no redemption fees.
6. Loan (Powered by Blooms MFB Ltd.)
- Repayment periods from 61 days to 6 months
- Loan amount from N2000 to N500000
- APR up to 36% per annum
*For example; N1000 is given for 90 days loan term,
*Interest: N90(9%rate)
*Total amount payable: N1090
*Representative: 36%APR
------------------------------------------------------------------
We take the security of your funds and data seriously. PalmPay uses the highest level of encryption to protect your personal and transaction information.
 
1. Insuring Your Money
Your deposits are safe! Every Deposit made on PalmPay is insured by the Nigeria Deposit Insurance Corporation (NDIC).
 
2. Transaction Screening
We screen all transactions using international databases as our proprietary systems to prevent money laundering and fraud. 
 
3. Security Certifications
PalmPay is PCI DSS certified to secure transactions against data theft and fraud. We are recognized by NITDA and comply with the NDPR for meeting the highest information security standards. 
 
4. Fraud Protection
In addition to automation, PalmPay’s teams work full time to intercept suspicious transactions, freeze suspected account and follow up on reports.
------------------------------------------------------------------
Contact us
We are always excited to hear from you. For any feedback or concerns, reach us via:
1. Helpline: 018886888
2. Email: support@palmpay.com
3. Website: https://www.palmpay.com/
4. Address: 20 opebi rode ikeja, Lagos
To know more, find us on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and Telegram.
1. Twitter: @palmpay_ng 
2. Facebook: @PalmPay Nigeria
3. Instagram: @palmpayapp_ng
4. TikTok: @palmpayapp
5. YouTube: @PalmPay
6. LinkedIn: PalmPay

apps.title: Project Finance Institute
apps.description:
We are bringing together professionals in the Project Finance, Infrastructure and PPP sectors. Together we are building the skills and relationships needed to deliver transformational global change for generations to come. 

Our members can:
+ Obtain a grounding in core PF financial modelling skills in our free Essential Financial Modelling course. 
+ Participate in our flagship Certified Project Finance Analyst Course
+ Develop practical skills through working on real-world projects and case studies
+ Connect and collaborate with peers and professionals from around the world
+ Attend member only events
…and much more!
Project Finance, Infrastructure and PPP professionals like you are building a better world.

Project by project. Bid by bid. Model by model.

--

Project Finance Institute offers an optional $99.99 annual subscription plan. When purchasing a subscription your iTunes account will only be charged at purchase confirmation or after the end of your free trial, if available. Subscriptions auto-renew unless cancelled 24 hrs prior to period end. You can manage your subscription or turn off auto-renewal in your iTunes Account settings after purchase.

Terms of Use: mn.co/terms_of_use

apps.title: MoneyWiz 2025 Personal Finance
apps.description:
Organize your day to day accounts, loans, savings, investments and even crypto in a convenient and secure way with MoneyWiz. MoneyWiz is the only personal finance app that can help you manage every aspect of your finances. 

AT A GLANCE
+ Tracking for bank and credit accounts, loans and debts, budgets and goals, bills and subscriptions, investments and crypto;
+ Automatic download of new transactions through direct connections to your banks;
+ Cloud backup and automatic sync across your iPhones, iPads and Macs;
+ Advanced import features, so you can quickly move your data from other apps;
+ Military grade data security with 256bit end-to-end encryption;
+ Extensive tutorials and built-in support chat with a real humans!


[ GET 1 WEEK FREE TRIAL ]
Check our extensive features today!


CONNECTED BANK ACCOUNTS
+ 40,000 banks in 55 countries via 4 data providers
+ Apple Wallet integration
+ Automatic detection of Transfers and Refunds
+ Automatic categorization with AI and learning
+ Get notifications for every new transaction

MANUAL ACCOUNTS
+ Track manually if connected bank accounts is not for you
+ Complete control over your transaction entry form
+ Post transactions in connected accounts too
+ Import OFX, QIF, CSV and MT940

ALL ACCOUNTS
+ Group accounts any way you want
+ Bulk edit 
+ Reconcile against bank statements
+ Custom account icons
+ Multi-currency support with automatic refresh of currency rates
+ Archive old accounts

INVESTMENTS
+ Support for all your stock market investments, including stocks, options, bonds and more
+ Unmatched support for Crypto and Forex investments for a personal finance app
+ Handling for investments pre-IPO and pre-ICO

BUDGETS & GOALS
+ Versatile budgeting tools for various styles, including envelope budgeting
+ Group budgets anyway you want
+ Real time progress indicators 

BILLS & SUBSCRIPTIONS
+ Get alerted when it's time to pay or get paid
+ Never forget a payment again
+ Tap on the calendar for instant Forecast based on your scheduled payments

REPORTS
+ Analyze your money with 30+ reports
+ Save reports for easy access in the future
+ Group reports any way you want
+ Export reports to PDF, CSV or print them

WEEKLY IMPROVEMENTS
Check out our version history and road map. 
We deliver new improvements weekly, based on your feedback. 

SUBSCRIPTION
We do not impose a limit on the number of accounts, budgets, regular or scheduled transactions you can create in MoneyWiz for free. However, you will need a subscription to enable certain features:
+ Premium subscription ($4.99/month or $49.99/year) enables bank sync and multi-device sync with a MoneyWiz Cloud account
+ Standard subscription ($19.99/year) enables multi-device sync with a MoneyWiz Cloud account

Your subscriptions will automatically renew each month (or year, depending on plan) and your credit card will be charged through your iTunes account. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings.

LINKS
Roadmap: https://wiz.money/roadmap
Privacy Policy: https://wiz.money/privacy/
Terms of Use: https://wiz.money/toc

apps.title: Alzex Finance
apps.description:
Separate budget files for any purpose: personal finance, family budget or company accounting. Versions for all platforms with cloud sync.

Elegant, super easy home accounting software.
"The app is very user friendly, easy to use and is full of functions that covers almost all needs for making and following personal budget. Great! 10 out of 10!" - Guntars Kaneps

Track family budget with fantastic ease!
The features which make this personal accounting software unique in its category are total simplicity and clearness. You can see at once from the summary view the way your money was spent, total sum and percentage structure for categories, balance on accounts, as well as overall balance.

Key features:

• Sync data across multiple devices and PC
Several users can work with a single database and sync changes over the Internet. Alzex Finance is integrated with Files app: you can use virtually any cloud service (or SMB, FTP, WebDAV, etc) to share your budget with your family or colleagues. Instruction: https://community.alzex.com/knowledge-base/article/sync_ios

• Entering recurring data with a single click
You can enter recurring transactions very quickly, simply type first few letters and select a transaction from the list of frequently used transactions, and then the program fills data to all fields of the form.

• Currencies
The program supports an unlimited number of currencies, cryptocurrencies and precious metals. Also you can add your own currencies, including "virtual" ones, i.e. you can keep track of money and other things (metals, petrol, units of measurement). Exchange rates can be downloaded from the Internet.

• Accounts
This is the main way of separating transactions in the program. You can create any number of accounts, such as credit cards, bank accounts, cash, electronic money, etc.

• Scheduler
The scheduler lets you create recurring transactions automatically. These transactions will be created automatically, without any user intervention, or with his confirmation, if needed.

• Reports
Reports help you to analyze your financial situation. It will help you to understand where your money is going and manage your income in the most efficient way.

• Budget
The program makes it easy to monitor progress in achieving your financial goals and control expenses.

Paid subscription is required to update currency exchange rates and use automatic sync. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Privacy policy: www.alzex.com/privacy-policy.html
Terms of service: https://www.alzex.com/terms-of-service.html

Contacts:
support@alzex.com
http://community.alzex.com

Your feedback is important to us in order to get an idea of how to make Alzex Finance software a better product for you. If you have a good idea of a new feature, or a better way of doing something, please drop us a note.

Technical support is provided by email. You can contact us at support@alzex.com.

Icons are provided by icons8.com

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Attention! The new version is not compatible with old versions, you should update the app on all devices. Your database file will be converted to a new format, so make a backup copy of your file before updating.

A lot of major and minor improvements. The complete list of changes and new features is available here: https://community.alzex.com/d/1540-a-new-version

apps.title: Tiger Trade: Invest Globally
apps.description:
Say goodbye to complicated account setups! Waive off high commission fees! No more limited options and functionalities! Bid farewell to confusing user interfaces!
Join Tiger Trade and experience the joy of one-click global investment with over 9 million users worldwide!
--Low Investment Entry Point
- Invest in global Top companies like Apple, Tesla, Alibaba, NVIDIA, McDonald's, and more starting at just US$1.
- Begin your regular investment in blue-chip Hong Kong stocks such as Tencent, BYD, AIA, HSBC, etc. from HK$ 500 onwards.
- Invest in Singapore stocks, Australia stocks, futures, options, and various other products with competitive fees.
--Tiger Community: Global Community, Active in Singapore
Engage with investors worldwide in our Tiger Community, with Singaporeans taking the lead. Discuss insights, share ideas, and stay updated 24/7. Dive into curated courses to boost your investment skills.
--AI-powered Investment Companion
--Tools for Discovery & Analysis
- Discover investment opportunities with trending stocks lists, popular ETF rankings, and more.
- Dive into comprehensive analyses spanning fundamentals, capital flow, technical aspects, valuations, and financial reporting for an all-rounded investment decision.
--Free real-time and in-depth market data
--Trade before and after market hours, with up to 16 hours of US stock trading time
--Robust options tools supporting various strategies, complemented with in-depth courses to guide you step by step
--Complimentary demo accounts for stocks, options and futures
--Unlimited daytrade times
 
We hold 70 global financial licenses and are under the supervision of multiple regulatory bodies, including the Monetary Authority of Singapore.

Tiger Trade doesn't charge any hidden fees. Please refer to our website for other applicable fees:  https://www.tigerbrokers.com.sg/commissions/fees.
Registered Address:1 RAFFLES PLACE #35-61 ONE RAFFLES PLACE SINGAPORE
Disclaimer: This advertisement has not been reviewed by the Monetary Authority of Singapore.

Engage with investors worldwide in our Tiger Community, with Singaporeans taking the lead. Discuss insights, share ideas, and stay updated 24/7. Dive into curated courses to boost your investment skills.
--AI-powered Investment Companion
--Tools for Discovery & Analysis
- Discover investment opportunities with trending stocks lists, popular ETF rankings, and more.
- Dive into comprehensive analyses spanning fundamentals, capital flow, technical aspects, valuations, and financial reporting for an all-rounded investment decision.
--Free real-time and in-depth market data
--Trade before and after market hours, with up to 16 hours of US stock trading time
--Robust options tools supporting various strategies, complemented with in-depth courses to guide you step by step
--Complimentary demo accounts for stocks, options and futures
--Unlimited daytrade times
 
We hold 70 global financial licenses and are under the supervision of multiple regulatory bodies, including the Monetary Authority of Singapore.

Tiger Trade doesn't charge any hidden fees. Please refer to our website for other applicable fees:  https://www.tigerbrokers.com.sg/commissions/fees.

apps.title: Monarch: Budget & Track Money
apps.description:
Consider Monarch your home base for money clarity. Simplify your finances by bringing all your accounts into one easy view, have confidence in always knowing where your money is and where it's going, and collaborate with your partner or financial professional to track, budget, and reach goals together.

Monarch has been recognized by the Wall Street Journal as the “Best Budgeting App,” by Forbes as the “Best Mint Replacement” and by Motley Fool as the “Best Budgeting App for Couples and Families.”

Getting started is simple. Connect your accounts and Monarch will auto-categorize your finances, giving you actionable insights in minutes. Customize your dashboard to give you the information you need at a glance, including your net worth, recent transactions, how you’re tracking toward your budget, investment performance, and upcoming expenses. 

Monarch makes it easy to take steps today to build toward your long term plans, all in one simple and collaborative financial tool.

Track
- Connect your accounts and see everything in one place so you can get a clear view of how your money is moving and track progress on your net worth.
- Always know what’s around the corner with subscriptions and bills tracked in one easy calendar or list view and notifications so you don’t miss a payment.
- Keep an eye on subscriptions so you can cancel what you no longer need.
- Sync with your credit cards and loans and Monarch will provide statement balances and minimum payment due.
- Search for any transaction, across all of your accounts - no shuffling between apps to find charges or refunds.
- View and customize reports for quick insights on your spending across groups and categories and trends over time.

Budget
- Monarch offers two ways to budget - Flex Budgeting or Category Budgeting - so you can choose to have the structure or flexibility you need and make budgeting feel easy.
- Get a quick view of your budget progress with visual progress bars and a dashboard widget.
- Customize your groups and categories, emojis, and your notifications to keep you on track.

Collaborate
- Add your partner or other household members and team up on your finances, whether you choose to have joint bank accounts or not. All at no extra cost.
- Invite your advisor, financial coach, tax professional or estate planning attorney so they can give you accurate advice with little effort required of you.

Plan
- Create and track progress toward your medium and long term goals.
- Set up contributions toward your goals within your monthly budget, and watch your savings compound over time.

A Membership With You in Mind

Our focus is on building a product that can transform your relationship to money, bringing clarity and confidence to your financial life. As a Monarch member, you’ll get access to all the new features we build and have the opportunity to vote on and provide feedback for new features on our roadmap. We build with the feedback from our community in mind. 

No Ads

Monarch is not supported by advertisers and is designed with the sole purpose of making it easy and intuitive for you to manage your finances. That means we will never interrupt your experience with ads or try to sell you another financial product you don’t need.

Private and Secure

Monarch uses bank-level security, and we never store any of your financial credentials. Our platform is read-only, so there is no risk of your money moving. We take your privacy seriously and will never sell your personal or financial information to third parties.

MEMBERSHIP DETAILS

Monarch is free to try for 7 days. After your trial period, a membership fee will be billed either monthly or annually, depending on which plan you select.

Privacy Policy: https://www.monarchmoney.com/privacy

Terms of Use: https://www.monarchmoney.com/terms

raw_data.releaseNotes:
You can now filter cash flow by accounts and tags for a more personalized experience.

We're always improving Monarch to better support you! Keep an eye out for more updates and fixes along the way.

apps.title: Autopilot - Investment App
apps.description:
Introducing Autopilot: An app that lets you automate your portfolio by copying top-notch traders in real-time, including Politicians via the Politician trade tracker account.
Autopilot makes investing stress free by allowing experienced pilots guide your investments. Choose from our world-class traders and copy them from the comfort and control of your portfolio - automatically.
- Connect your existing portfolio and copy any of our top pilots.
- Join the Autopilot Club to gain access to all future trades, perks, and more!

Support
Email support at any time on the Autopilot App. 

Disclosures
‍
Investing in securities involves significant risk, including the risk of loss of principal. Past performance does not guarantee future results, and there can be no assurance that any investment strategy or security will meet its objectives or achieve any specific financial outcome. You should only invest risk capital that you can afford to lose without impacting your financial stability.

The information provided on this website and the Autopilot app is for informational purposes only. Autopilot Holdings Corporation ("Autopilot Holdings") is not an investment adviser and does not provide investment advice. Advice provided on this website and through the Autopilot app is generated and managed by Autopilot Advisers, LLC ("Autopilot Advisers"; together with Autopilot Holdings, "Autopilot"), which is an investment adviser registered with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).

Autopilot, 200 Spectrum Center Dr. Irvine, CA 92618

apps.title: KFH Online
apps.description:
مع خدمة "التمويل أون لاين" من "بيتك" يمكنك الآن إتمام معاملاتك المالية بسهولة وأمان باستخدام أجهزة IPhone و IPod Touch و IPad
‎‪للدخول إلى الخدمة يرجى استخدام اسم المستخدم و كلمة السر الخاصة بك لخدمة "التمويل أون لاين"
‎‪مميزات الخدمة:
 
-  عرض ملخص أرصدة الحسابات و الودائع
-  عرض كشف تفصيلي لحساباتك
-  متابعة معاملات وتسوية مستحقات بطاقاتك الائتمانية
-  تحويلات المالية بين حساباتك الخاصة
-  تحويلات المالية إلى حسابات أخرى داخل بيتك
- تحويلات مالية لبنوك محلية وعالمية
- تحويل إلى حساب بيتك للتداول
- التبرع للجان الخيرية
-  إمكانية تغيير كلمة السر وتعديل آلية رمز الدخول
-  دفع فواتير
-  شراء بطاقات الدفع المسبق للهاتف النقال
-  عرض تفاصيل المعاملات التجارية و دفع الأقساط التجارية
-  الإبلاغ عن فقدان أو سرقة بطاقة الائتمان أو بطاقة سحب آلي
-  تفعيل بطاقة الصرف الآلي وبطاقة الإئتمان
-  طلب دفتر شيكات
-  خدمة البريد الإلكتروني
-  خدمة الرسائل القصيرة
-  خدمة حماية بطاقات الإئتمان
-  ربط الحسابات على بطاقة الصرف الآلي
-  أوامر دائمة للحسابات، للبطاقات، للجان خيرية
- والمزيد من الخدمات الآخرى
 
‎‪للاشتراك في خدمة "التمويل أون لاين" أو للحصول على الصلاحيات الكاملة، يرجى الاتصال على خدمة ألو بيتك الهاتفية 1803333 أو مراجعة أقرب فرع مصرفي لـ " بيتك".


With KFHOnline service you can now easily and securely conduct your financial transactions easily from your iPhone, iPod touch and iPad.
‪Use your existing KFH Online user ID and password to access the service.
‪
Service Features:
 
- Summary of your accounts and deposits
‪- Statement for your accounts
- Keep track of your credit card transactions and settle credit card dues
- Transfer funds between your own accounts
‪- Transfer funds to third party accounts in KFH
- Local/International transfers
- Transfer to KFH Trade account
- Transfer to charities
- Forgot Password and Manage Site Key
- Buy mobile voucher
- Pay bills
‪‪- View details of your commercial invoices & Pay installments
- Report lost or stolen ATM Cards & Credit Cards
- Activate ATM Cards & Credit Cards
- Cheque Book Request
‪‪- Mailbox service
- SMS Baitak Service
- 3D Secure Service
- Link Accounts to ATM card
- Standing Order to Accounts, Credit Cards & Charities
- and more other services
 
‪‪‪To subscribe to KFHOnline, or to get Full Access to the service, call Allo Baitak 1803333 or visit the nearest KFH branch.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Thank you for using KFH Online App in this update we have included:
General enhancements and bug fixes.

apps.title: FFC Online
apps.description:
يوفر تطبيق FFC Mobile الجديد من شركة الأولى للتمويل خدمات وافرة عبر الجوال معدة خصيصا لتلبية متطلباتك التمويلية. قم الآن بإدارة تمويلاتك يوميا وبكل سهولة.

يوفر التطبيق العديد من الخدمات الإلكترونية منها:
  1- إنشاء حساب مستخدم والدخول بأمان عبر كلمة السر لمرة واحدة (OTP) والخصائص البيوميترية
  2- طلب التمويل (تقديم طلب التمويل، تحميل المستندات المطلوبة، إدخال معلومات التعليمات المستديمة، ومراجعة التفاصيل والمتابعة، ودفع تكلفة تقرير إستعلام مركز قطر للمعلومات الإئتمانية عبر التطبيق...)
  3- الحصول على الإشعارات بواسطة البريد الإلكتروني والرسائل القصيرة
  4- الإطلاع على العروض
  5- الإطلاع على جميع المنتجات
  6- الإطلاع على مواقع الفروع وتفاصيل الاتصال وساعات العمل 
  7- الوصول إلى وسائل التواصل الاجتماعي
  8- الحصول على أسعار صرف العملات

ترقبوا المزيد من الم ربات قريبا!

عملية التسجيل سهلة ويمكن أن تتم بخطوات بسيطة بإمكانكم البدء بإستخدام التطبيق الآن!

First Finance Company’s newest mobile app – FFC Mobile, offers seamless mobile services tailored to your financial needs. Now, manage your finances easily on a daily basis.

The app allows you to:
  1- Register a user account then login securely with OTP and biometric features
  2- Book for Finance (apply for finance, upload required documents, input standing order information, make e-payments such as Credit Bureau report fees)
  3- Finance request management, details, and tracking updates
  4- Get live notifications via email and SMS
  5- Discover promotions
  6- View products catalogue
  7- Get branches’ location, contact details and working hours
  8- Access social media channels
  9- Convert multi-currency rates 

More features coming soon!

Registration is simple and can be done with just a few steps. In fact, you can try the app right now!

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Enhancements
- Bug fixing

apps.title: Access More
apps.description:
The Access More App is an innovative mobile payment application that offers a more than banking experience. The App is built to help our customers consummate their financial transactions, payment solutions and enjoy a lifestyle experience. Prospect customers are welcome to become account holders by downloading the App and onboarding themselves on the platform seamlessly.
 
The App is built on cutting-edge technology, offering tailored and personalized services, ease of use and excellent customer experience to all our customers
 
The following unique features are available on the App:
Quick account opening
Personalized theme and color scheme
Bespoke dashboards
Single click to all favorite features
Self QR generation for intra-bank transfers
Scan QR for payments
Investment services
PayDay Loan
Dubai Visa application
Movie Ticket purchase
Improved beneficiary management
Efficient bills payment
Inter-bank transfers
Simplified foreign currency transfer service
Airtime top-up
Cheque Services (New cheque book request, stop and confirm cheque)
Card Services (New debit card request, card block and unblock)
Transfers to Access Y’ello accounts
Gaming
And lots more….
 
How to get the Access More App
 
Download and install the Access More App
Existing Access Mobile App users can login with the same username and password and transact with their existing PIN
Existing Diamond Mobile App users can login with the same username and password and transact with their existing PIN
For new users, simply open the downloaded App and register

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We’re live in Tanzania!
We also made some enhancements to fix bugs in Nigeria.

apps.title: LendingTree Spring
apps.description:
Spring into a world of smart money habits with free credit score updates and alerts, personalized saving insights, easy loan and credit card shopping, and more!  

 UNLOCK YOUR CREDIT SCORE POTENTIAL 

See what’s hurting your credit score and what’s helping it 

Dig deeper into the factors that make up your score 

Get helpful ideas to help grow your credit health and track progress over time 


GET PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATIONS 

Explore customized financial tips and insights tailored to you  

Get suggestions to help you save and improve your finances 

Feel confident with expert advice for easy decision-making 


SHOP FOR LOANS AND CREDIT CARDS 

Find your perfect match! Compare personal loans, mortgages, business loans and more 

Get your best rates from the biggest lender network in the U.S. 

Receive personalized offers from multiple lenders — all in Spring! 


STAY PROTECTED AND FIGHT FRAUD WITH SPRING 

Get peace of mind with instant credit monitoring alerts 

Receive alerts when there are changes to your credit file 

Receive updates whenever your credit score changes 


LendingTree Spring, where smart habits take root. 


Personal Loans Disclosure: Conditional personal loan offers through LendingTree’s marketplace are from third party providers of financial products and services from whom LendingTree may receive compensation. All customers may not qualify. Rates and other loan terms are controlled by third parties, not LendingTree, and are subject to change without notice, including at the point of application. apps.title: Fizz - #1 Credit & Money App
apps.description:
Fizz is the #1 credit and money app trusted by over 100,000 young adults. Named the best credit builder by Business Insider, Fizz is there for you in college and beyond.

ALL-IN-ONE FINANCIAL SOLUTION FOR YOUNG ADULTS
Whether you want to build credit, manage your money or have no idea where to start, Fizz is there to help you every step of the way. Fizz is free to download giving you all the tools you need to succeed.

BUILD CREDIT THE EASY WAY
Fizz members get a debit card that builds credit with no interest, hidden charges or late fees. To get started, simply connect your bank account and get a spending limit based on how much money you have. With daily autopay, your card gets paid off every day so you never have to worry about overspending.

CHECK YOUR CREDIT SCORE FOR FREE WITH NO HARD PULLS
Check your score and stay on top of any changes. Don’t have a score yet? Fizz will walk you step-by-step through the process of establishing your credit score.

KNOW WHERE YOUR MONEY GOES
Find out exactly where all of your cash goes every month. See your money trends, set category limits to stop you from spending too much and get a custom budget based on your personal history.

LEARN THE THINGS THEY DON’T TEACH IN COLLEGE
Learning about personal finance will pay dividends throughout your life. Get access to dozens of game-like lessons on investing, credit, budgeting, and more. Not sure where to start? Take a 2-minute money GPA quiz to help guide you in the right direction.

GET REWARDS AND MORE MONEY IN YOUR POCKET
The Fizz card comes with 3% weekly cashback on the category of your choice, fun surprises on the first Friday of every month and exclusive campus deals of up to 100% off at places like Chipotle, Starbucks, Target and more.

Disclaimers:
ShoulderTap Technologies, Inc. d/b/a Fizz © 2024. 450 Broadway, Level 2, New York, NY 10013. All rights reserved. FIZZ® is registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office.

Fizz is not a bank. The Fizz Debit Mastercard® is issued by Patriot Bank, N.A., Member FDIC, pursuant to a license from Mastercard®. The Fizz Visa® Debit Card (together with the Fizz Mastercard, the “Fizz Card”) is issued by Lead Bank, Member FDIC, pursuant to a license from Visa® and may be used everywhere Visa® debit cards are accepted. Any loans offered in connection with the Fizz Card are originated by Lead Bank. Any promotions or rewards offered in connection with the Fizz Card are offered and managed by Fizz, not our bank partners. Any servicing, brokering, and collections activity is conducted by Fizz Technologies, Inc.

Fizz Members may choose to apply for a Fizz Card, but are not required to. Fizz Membership does not guarantee access to a Fizz Card. Application and eligibility restrictions apply.

*Customers who successfully qualify, apply for, and accept a line of credit (LOC) will receive an initial LOC between $90 and $1,000 based on info provided during underwriting. LOCs may be adjusted over time based on repayment history if criteria are met. Contact customer support to request a free LOC app. 

Fizz cardholders: Increases or specific changes to your credit score are not guaranteed. Impact on your credit score may vary depending on your use. Fizz is required to report late payments, which may negatively impact your credit score. Credit scores are independently determined by credit bureaus based on a number of factors, including your activity with other creditors. The Fizz Card and related services will not remove negative credit history from your credit report. Fizz, on behalf of Lead Bank, will report your activities to Experian® and Transunion® .

For additional information, terms and conditions applicable to your use of Fizz’s services visit www.joinfizz.com.

apps.title: Drahim: Manage & Grow Finances
apps.description:
Drahim is here to answer the question, 'Where does my money go?'

Drahim helps you manage your personal expenses, how? By allowing you to consolidate your bank accounts in one place. You can track them by directly connecting them to your bank accounts through Open Banking, licensed by the Saudi Central Bank.

Moreover, it enables you to monitor your expenses in real-time after every transaction, with an automatic engine that categorizes all your purchases, transfers, and commitments.
But that's not all!

In Drahim, you can manage and grow your money by opening an investment wallet with diverse assets, tailored to your long-term financial goals, and authorized by the Saudi Capital Market Authority.

In summary,
#Your_Drahim_In_One_Place

Privacy: https://Drahim.sa/Privacy
Terms and Conditions: https://Drahim.sa/Terms

raw_data.sellerName: Drahim App For Financial Technology LLC
raw_data.releaseNotes:
Hello! We’re thrilled to share the latest updates in Drahim:

- The ability to order investment portfolios manually
- View your Mokafaa points balance when depositing into investment wallet

Note: These features will be gradually rolled out to all users.

We always strive to deliver the best based on your feedback and suggestions.

apps.title: iMuthoot: Loans
apps.description:
The iMuthoot app by Muthoot Finance is a trusted digital platform used by millions of
users. It allows you to apply for instant loans, manage and repay gold loans, personal
loans, business loans, home loans, and LAP, pay utility bills, recharge mobiles, and even
shop online – all from one secure app.
Key Features
- [ ]  Loans Made Simple: Apply for Gold Loan, Personal Loan, Home Loan, Property
Loan (LAP), Business Loan and more in just a few steps
Highlights of Personal Loan
 - Personal Loan Amount: ₹50,000 to ₹20 Lakh
 - Repayment Tenure: 12 to 72 months
 - Rate of Interest: 12.99% to 32% p.a.
 - Processing Fees: Up to 4.13% of the loan amount (inclusive of applicable taxes)
Example: For a personal loan of ₹1,00,000 at an interest rate of 15% per annum for 12
months resulting in ₹8,310 interest amount (interest rate on a reducing balance
method), with a processing fee of 4.13% (₹4,130) and other charges of ₹500, the total
amount to be repaid after a year is approximately ₹1,12,940.
Note: This is an estimate; the actual interest rate, processing fees and other charges
may vary depending on the product.
- [ ]  Smart Loan Management: Pay interest or full amount, renew loans, avail top-ups, or use Flexi Credit to withdraw as needed and pay interest only on what you use. Track and repay EMIs for personal and business loans easily
- [ ]  Exclusive Offers & Rewards: Get personalized loan offers based on your repayment history and earn redeemable rewards with every transaction
- [ ]  Bill Payments & Recharges: Pay electricity, water, mobile, and other bills instantly. Even use your gold loan top-up balance for bill payments when low on cash, with timely reminders for your next due
- [ ]  Shopping Made Easy: Shop conveniently with your Muthoot Finance gold loan balance
- [ ]  Smart Tools: Access EMI calculators, repayment reminders, and personalized notifications to stay in control of your finances
- [ ]  Simple & Secure Access: Link your bank accounts and PAN, locate nearby branches, and manage all services in one safe app

Why Choose iMuthoot?
- [ ]  Repay gold loan interest/principal and EMIs for other loans instantly
- [ ]  Get instant top-up on gold loans with direct credit to your bank account
- [ ]  Apply for a wide range of loan products anytime, anywhere
- [ ]  Pay bills, recharge mobiles, and enjoy secure digital convenience

Download iMuthoot today and experience a faster, smarter, and more rewarding way to
borrow, repay, and manage your finances.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
iMuthoot just got better for you!

Smarter notifications to keep you updated.

Smoother experience with minor fixes.
