apps.title: paramla
apps.description:
paramla’s mission is to facilitate ‘financial wellbeing’ by encouraging savings and improving financial literacy.

With paramla,

you can easily track

▪  values
▪  percentage break-downs
▪  trends
▪  total & average costs
▪  profit/loss amounts & margins
▪  profit/loss trends

of your assets simply by entering their quantities (€20.000, 50 units of Apple Stock, 100 Gr Gold, 100.000 Retirement Fund, $3.000 Eurobond, 1 BTC etc.) and unit costs picking from 25K assets under 8 categories:

▪ TRY (Safe | Demand Deposit | Time Deposit | PPS | Other)
▪ BIST (with 15 min delay)
▪ Commodity
▪ Foreign Currency
▪ Fund (Securities | Pension | ETF)
▪ Eurobond (with 15 min delay)
▪ Crypto
▪ USA Exchanges

accompanied by prices, trends and ‘Top Performers’ of 25K assets

▪ on a single screen
▪ in 80 currencies
▪ with reader friendly graphs
▪ creating & naming up to 20 portfolios
▪ syncing up to 10 devices to share / co-manage
▪ easily tracking macro financial news via push notifications
▪ in English or Turkish with a single tap
▪ with Finger/Face Recognition
▪ always remaining ‘anonymous’
▪ with 30-days free trial

At paramla,

there is no

× sign-up | sign-in | password
× personal data (name, surname, e-mail address etc.) sharing
× deposit/withdrawal or buy/sell activity of any financial asset or any monetary transaction whatsoever
× financial advisory/consultancy service whatsoever

Enjoy!

Subscription Fee: 39,99 TRY/month for Turkey; 0,99 EUR/month or 0,99 USD/month elsewhere post 30-day free trial and to be triggered only by the user

Address: Barbaros Mah, Begonya Sk, NidaKule - Batı Bl, No: 1/2, 34746 Ataşehir, İstanbul, Türkiye

apps.title: dub | Copy Trade Anyone
apps.description:
dub is like Instagram for investing.

1. You can copy other investors: copy trade Insiders, Hedge Fund Managers, top traders on Twitter / X, and more!
2. OR you can get copied: anyone can make a stock portfolio, publish it, and get copied by other dub users.

HOW DO YOU COPY?
- A portfolio is a basket of stocks, like an ETF.
- Copy a portfolio with any amount of $, the same way you buy a single stock. Then you buy each stock in the portfolio at its % weight.
- When the portfolio you copy trades, you automatically trade at the same time and price.

COPY PORTFOLIOS MADE BY OTHER USERS AND PROFESSIONALS
- Today, you can copy influential finance personalities from platforms like X (Twitter) or SeekingAlpha and current/former Hedge Fund managers.
- We also have portfolios built by users that model 13F and public filings from hedge fund managers and insiders.
- Soon you can also copy your friends, family, or any user on the platform!

CREATE YOUR OWN PORTFOLIO
- Anyone can create their portfolio for others to copy or for personal money management.
- Build investment strategies with access to thousands of US stocks leveraging fractional investing technology.

SHARE YOUR PORTFOLIO AND COMPETE WITH OTHERS
- Show off your investing skills by making a portfolio others can copy!
- Discover great investors by seeing validated & real-time performance and track records.
- Compete against other users and friends to see who has the better portfolio.

INVEST WITH AS LITTLE AS $100
- The minimum deposit is just $100 to start copying a portfolio.
- We strive to make dub available to all investors.

dub Premium
- Premium is a paid platform subscription that gives you access to unlimited copying of portfolios and making portfolios
- Without Premium: you can browse and learn about portfolios and their trading styles
- Free Trial: everyone gets one week free of Premium
- Subscription Plans: Premium comes in either a monthly or annual plan

Terms of Use: https://support.dubapp.com/hc/en-us/articles/17915510560155-Terms-of-Use

Subscription Agreement: https://support.dubapp.com/hc/en-us/articles/23862671632027-dub-Platform-Subscription-Agreement

raw_data.releaseNotes:
dubbers,
Just the usual bug fixes and performance improvements this week.

Thank you!
Team dub

apps.title: BNN Bloomberg: Finance, Stocks
apps.description:
Discover BNN Bloomberg's new and improved app!

Stay on top of your portfolio with BNN Bloomberg, Canada’s definitive source for business news.

From real-time stock market data to in-depth market analysis, find all the information you need about Canadian and global markets in one place.


Why Choose BNN Bloomberg?

1. Real-Time Market Data – Access the latest financial data covering Canadian, American, and global markets across all industries. Gain valuable insights into gainers, losers and most active securities. Follow major indices such as the TSX, S&P 500, DJIA, and NASDAQ.

2. Customizable Stock List & Feed – Keep a close watch on the performance of the stocks and financial news that matter most to you.

3. Live & On Demand Expert Coverage – Gain insights from leading market experts, money managers and fund managers in real-time or at your convenience. Enjoy our award-winning shows such as BNN Bloomberg, Bloomberg Television*, Market Call, MoneyTalk, Commodities, The Open, Berman's Call, Trading Day, The Close, Bloomberg Surveillance, and The Street.

4. Breaking Market-Moving News – Stay updated on a wide range of financial and business topics, including Bank of Canada updates, personal finance, real estate, economics, technology, and more.

Investing / Stock Trading / Portfolio Management / Wealth Management / Asset Management / Market Trends / Economic Indicators / Capital Markets / Foreign Exchange / ETFs / REITs / Wall Street / Financials / Consumer Discretionary / Consumer Staples / Health Care / Energy / Industrials / Materials / Telecommunications / Utilities / Interest Rates / Alpha


*PLEASE NOTE*

All BNN Bloomberg video content is free to watch. However, access to BNN Bloomberg Television requires a subscription.

Terms and Conditions –
https://www.bellmedia.ca/bell-media-website-terms-conditions/ 

Privacy Policy –
https://www.bell.ca/Security_and_privacy/Commitment_to_privacy#EXT=MULTI_off_URL_privacy_20110917_pc_ 

Have a question or want to share some feedback? Contact us at: https://www.bnnbloomberg.ca/contact-us

Discover BNN Bloomberg's new and improved app!

Stay on top of your portfolio with BNN Bloomberg, Canada’s definitive source for business news.

From real-time stock market data to in-depth market analysis, find all the information you need about Canadian and global markets in one place.


Why Choose BNN Bloomberg?

1. Real-Time Market Data – Access the latest financial data covering Canadian, American, and global markets across all industries. Gain valuable insights into gainers, losers and most active securities. Follow major indices such as the TSX, S&P 500, DJIA, and NASDAQ.

2. Customizable Stock List & Feed – Keep a close watch on the performance of the stocks and financial news that matter most to you.

3. Live & On Demand Expert Coverage – Gain insights from leading market experts, money managers and fund managers in real-time or at your convenience. Enjoy our award-winning shows such as BNN Bloomberg, Bloomberg Television*, Market Call, MoneyTalk, Commodities, The Open, Berman's Call, Trading Day, The Close, Bloomberg Surveillance, and The Street.

4. Breaking Market-Moving News – Stay updated on a wide range of financial and business topics, including Bank of Canada updates, personal finance, real estate, economics, technology, and more.

Investing / Stock Trading / Portfolio Management / Wealth Management / Asset Management / Market Trends / Economic Indicators / Capital Markets / Foreign Exchange / ETFs / REITs / Wall Street / Financials / Consumer Discretionary / Consumer Staples / Health Care / Energy / Industrials / Materials / Telecommunications / Utilities / Interest Rates / Alpha


*PLEASE NOTE*

All BNN Bloomberg video content is free to watch. However, access to BNN Bloomberg Television requires a subscription.

Terms and Conditions –
https://www.bellmedia.ca/bell-media-website-terms-conditions/ 

Privacy Policy –
https://www.bell.ca/Security_and_privacy/Commitment_to_privacy#EXT=MULTI_off_URL_privacy_20110917_pc_ 

Have a question or want to share some feedback? Contact us at: https://www.bnnbloomberg.ca/contact-us

apps.title: Expense Manager: Money Note
apps.description:
MoneyNote is a simple and easy-to-use household budgeting app.
Just enter your expenses and income on the clean, intuitive input screen, and the app will automatically generate a calendar and reports. It’s an easy way to manage your household finances.

▼ Features
* Simple and easy to use
* No registration required
* All features available without Subscriptions
* Quick entry directly from the calendar
* Monthly, yearly, and cumulative reports

* Create your own custom categories
* Set fixed income and expenses
* 20 theme colors and 25 app icons available
* Backup support and CSV export
* Passcode lock (including Face ID and Touch ID)

▼ Feature Details
◆ Input
Tap a category button to quickly enter the amount.
The built-in keyboard includes a convenient calculator.
Large numbers and easy-to-press buttons make entry simple and smooth.
There's also an "Auto Input" mode, perfect for entering multiple receipts one after another.

◆ Calendar
Easily track your income and expenses at a glance with the calendar view.
You can customize the start day of the week and set flexible start and end dates for your months.
Entries can be added or deleted directly from the calendar, making batch input easy.
Savings and starting balances can be set, allowing you to view carryover amounts and cumulative totals.

◆ Reports
Visualize your monthly income and expenses with pie charts.
See the balance between income and spending at a glance.
Analyze spending by category to easily spot wasteful or unnecessary expenses.

◆ Backup & CSV Export
Export your data as CSV files compatible with Excel.
These files also serve as backups, so you can easily restore your data when switching to a new iPhone or iPad.
CSV files can also be used on a computer for further accounting tasks, such as tax return preparation.

◆ Theme Colors
Customize the app with over 20 different theme colors, from cute pink to elegant dark blue.
You can also change the app icon to match your chosen theme, with more than 25 designs available.

◆ Passcode Lock
Protect your financial data with a passcode lock.
Supports Touch ID and Face ID for quick and secure access.
All security features are available completely free of charge.

MoneyNote is a simple, user-friendly household account book app, designed to be easy for anyone to use.
Rather than overwhelming you with complicated features like receipt scanning, it focuses on essential functions for practical daily use.
Download it today and experience the new standard for household budgeting!

apps.title: Pocket Expense 6
apps.description:
Pocket Expense is a full-featured finance software that you can carry in your pocket. It is a powerful and easy to use program that will help you track and understand your personal finance. Designed and developed by polycents!

Pocket Expense brings all your financial accounts together, categorizes your transactions, tracks all your bills, lets you set budgets and helps you achieve your savings goals. In just minutes, you’ll see where your money is going and where you could save money.

TRACK YOUR ACCOUNTS
You can easily input and manage your accounts. All your accounts will be displayed in one place.

You are supplied with a set of icons for your accounts. All transactions related to the same account will be displayed in one page so that you can manage them easily.   

√ Support multiple account and account type
√ Statistic for daily/weekly/monthly/yearly overall
√ Track balance of each account

BUDGET MANAGEMENT
Stay in control and monitor your spending with the help of this budget tracker feature. Set yourself a limit and debit all your payments. You can always see how much money is left until your budget is gone and whether you might better postpone a purchase. Over time this should help to save some money instead of going into dept.

√ Support multiple budgets
√ See your income and expenses of one budget through charts
√ Recurring and non-recurring budget 
√ Move funds from one budget to another in a single operation 
√ At the end of each cycle, all information for a budget is archived and can be easily viewed for comparative purpose

TRACK YOUR BILLS
Pocket Expense will make sure that you’re never late for even one bill. By tracking each bill, which is customizable with different reminder alert periods.
√ Support multiple bills of different recurring
√ Set alerts to remind you of which bills are close to due dates or overdue
√ Allows for the payment of bills in full or in part
√ Support multiple payments of each bill
√ Support calendar view
√ Show total amount of all and overdue bills
√ Mark bills with icons according to their status


Other Key features:
- Password protection
- Simple, attractive interface
- Payers & payees management
- Category management
- Provide help document
- Powerful statistics and reports of all your transactions
- Quickly search for transactions and edit from the same screen
- Complete world currency list
- Backup and restore all your data over WiFi


# Subscription Details #
- Monthly and annual subscriptions are available.
- Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
- Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is disabled at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period.
- Automatic renewals will be charged at the same price you were originally charged for the subscription.
- Subscriptions can be managed by going to Account Settings on the App Store after purchase.
Terms of Use: https://www.iubenda.com/terms-and-conditions/7775087
Privacy Policy: https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/7775087


If you have any problems or suggestions please send a mail to expense@support.polycents.com, you’ll get the response in a short time.

If you haver any questions or run into any trouble – please contact us at expense@support.polycents.com and we’ll be glad to help you.

apps.title: Money Pro: Personal Finance AR
apps.description:
EASY BUDGET. Cut your expenses with Money Pro®!
Expense tracker, budget planner & account manager - all in one app to get your finances under control. Money Pro works great for personal & family expense tracking.

Easy sync and iPhone/iPad versions combined in one app. Money Pro is the next generation of the Money app (over 2 million downloads worldwide).

FEATURES:

Simple and Secure
- quick and easy expense/income entries: save your time
- password & backups of your data

Income and Expense Tracker
- split transactions: split one payment into multiple categories, keep it all organized
- search by amount, category, description, payee, cheque number, etc
- recurring expenses with custom periodicity
- calendar for scheduling bills and expenses for the whole year ahead
- notifications & alerts for bills due
- tracking expenses with family members and cross-platform syncing* (PLUS or GOLD subscription required)
- multiple profiles for organized tracking of personal and family finances
- attachment of receipt (or any other) photos: keep important bills captured

Budget Planner
- flexible structure of categories & subcategories with over 1,500 built-in icons
- custom periodicity: start your budget from any date
- visual indicators for budget spending
- transaction list for each category: access your bills with ease 
- transferring the leftover of the previous budget period to the current one to limit your spending
- unique icons with your photos

Account Manager
- easy management of an unlimited number of accounts
- balance change history
- additional fields for organizing your records: payee, description, check #, class (personal/business travel expenses). 
- import of bank statements (files: OFX, CSV)
- online banking (GOLD subscription required)

Insightful Analytics
- eight different reports
- filter customization
- quick and easy date selection

Augmented Reality
- build three-dimensional charts right on your table with AR reports (GOLD subscription required)

Goals
- set your goals and achieve them
- visualize your goal progress with a trend chart
- four Goal types: Save money, Pay off debt, Reduce expenses, Increase income (GOLD subscription required for last three)

More
- calculator and currency converter
- print and export to PDF, QIF, CSV formats
- multiple currencies & automatic update of exchange rates
- iCloud sync for iPhone, iPad, Mac (no subscription)
- support service & user guide (https://money.pro/guide/)

PLUS subscription
- 1 Month of PLUS: $4.99

GOLD subscription
- 1 Month of GOLD: $9.99

In all the countries (except the USA), actual charges will be converted to the local currency. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. 
Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. 
Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.
Subscriptions may be managed by the user, and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.

Terms & Privacy
- http://ibearsoft.com/privacy.html
- http://ibearsoft.com/terms.html

Money Pro is a Universal app. Pay once and use it on your iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch.

*See App Support for further details

apps.title: Mobills - Budget Planner
apps.description:
With Mobills you can take control of your finances in a few minutes and have financial peace of mind every month.

Mobills is a budget planning app that allows you to create a custom monthly budget that will help you take control of your money. You are able to manage your money, track your spending, and achieve your financial goals all in one place.

When you create a plan for your money, you are then able to ensure that you will always have enough for the things you need and the things that are important to you. By using Mobills budget planner and bill payment reminder, you can also stay out of debt, and save money.

▸ Track your expenses and income
The app has an intuitive and easy to use interface so that you can track your finances hassle-free.

▸ Know where your money is going
Avoid scattered information in notes, statements, and expense spreadsheets. With Mobills, you can analyze your personal finances in a comprehensive manner, using graphs and reports.

▸ Financial Planning
You are able to plan your finances and goals by creating categories. Thus, creating a customized budget that works for you and your family, while tracking your expenses throughout the month.

▸ Credit card control
With Mobills you can manage all your credit cards in one place. Track your limit, total amount due, and never lose control of your  personal finances again with a built-in bill payment reminder.

▸ Learn how to save and keep your budget under control
When you take control and categorize your expenses, you will know exactly what you are spending and how you can avoid overspending.

▸ Never miss a bill's due date
You will be alerted every time a bill needs to be paid. Which allows you to take control of due dates, and gives you financial tranquility.

CHECK OUR FEATURES

▸ Credit card manager
▸ Financial goals and budgets 
▸ Customized graphs and reports
▸ Advanced filters by bill, category, and tag
▸ Cloud synchronization (you can use it online and offline)
▸ Financial goals manager
▸ Expenses with geolocation
▸ Store and save your receipts
▸ Bill payment alerts
▸ Monthly and annual cash flow graphs
▸ Budget Planner and bill reminder
▸ Debt control

Support in English:
Our support is free and totally in English, got questions? Send us a message.

Mobills is a free personal finance application with some limitations, but you can be Premium with a monthly or annually subscription and have access to all of the features described above.

Once you sign up, you don't have to worry, the renewal will be done automatically. If you change your mind, you can cancel your subscription or turn off automatic renewal at any time through your iTunes account (provided it is made at least 24 hours before your subscription renewal). The value of the current subscription can not be refunded and the service can not be interrupted in case of cancellation during the period of validity.

You can manage your subscription through your iTunes account.
To access your account: iTunes> iTunes Store> Your account> Settings> Signatures Manage

Terms of use and privacy policy: https://www.mobillsapp.com/terms-of-use

Address: R. Monsenhor Bruno, 1153 - Sala 11 - Meireles, Fortaleza - CE, 60115-170

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Bug fixes and performance improvements 

Any questions? Contact us via email suporte@mobills.com.br

apps.title: Finance – Expenses and Income
apps.description:
The Finance - is your personal assistant, thanks to which you can understand where funds are going, identify sources of income and plan a budget.

• Operations and analytics
Record operations by categories of expenses or income, if there are enough standard categories - you can easily create your own. Detailed analytics will tell you when and where you spent the most. The application supports multiple accounts and different currencies.

• Budgets
You can create a budget for any expense category and for any period (week, month, year). After that, the application will start tracking all transactions in this category and will tell you if you are over budget. Budgets are automatically extended for the next period.

• Objectives
Are you planning a big purchase? Or do you want to save a certain amount? For these tasks, the application has "Goals", just specify the required amount and start replenishing it.

• Templates
Do you often record the same operations? Paying for a cellular connection, for example, or a subscription to music. In Finance, you can set a schedule for such operations, after which they will be performed automatically, and on the day of payment you will receive a reminder.

• Personalization
You can customize Finance for yourself, choose an icon, change app colors, even the location of widgets on the main screen of the application can be changed. If you want to hide the content from prying eyes, you can set a password inside the application.

• Subscription information
Subscription must be activeif you want to use the premium features of the app. Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at the confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your account settings on the App Store after purchase.

Terms of Use: https://finance.alxrguz.ru/terms-of-use
Privacy Policy: https://finance.alxrguz.ru/privacy-policy

raw_data.releaseNotes: Fixed application crash when changing color

apps.title: SFVegas
apps.description: SFA  is excited to once again present the largest capital markets conference in the world, SFVegas 2020, February 23-26, 2020, at the Aria Resort & Casino in Las Vegas. The three-and-a-half day program is developed by leaders within the structured finance industry representing the full spectrum of industry participants including investors, issuers, financial intermediaries, regulators, law firms, accounting firms, technology firms, rating agencies, servicers and trustees.

apps.title: ENBD X
apps.description:
With ENBD X, a new standard of excellence, embark on a groundbreaking journey to mobile banking on your phone. Seamlessly navigate through all your Emirates NBD products to gain control of your finances. This cutting-edge app empowers you to securely manage your accounts and cards with the assurance from Emirates NBD to bring you best in class banking products and services. 

Emirates NBD, known for its commitment to innovation, ensures your financial wellbeing and security with ENBD X. 

Access over 150+ services, with majority of them being processed instantly on the app with no extra steps. Lock and unlock your Emirates NBD card effortlessly, reset your card PIN, request statements, letters with just a few taps, and set precise spending and withdrawal limits to match your financial preferences. See the historical information about your transactions on your accounts, cards and loans. Moreover, you can open an investment portfolio instantly and start trading in Global and Local Equities. You can find best of deals, offers and benefits of banking with Emirates NBD with the ease and convenience of the ENBD X mobile app. 

ENBD X, proudly brought to you by Emirates NBD, not only simplifies your daily digital banking but also offers lightning-fast international money transfer feature to multiple destinations with DirectRemit. Additionally, managing your finances is a breeze, as you can conveniently pay your bills or top up your mobile phone with Emirates NBD's secure and user-friendly app.

Embrace banking like never before with Emirates NBD's ENBD X app – your trusted companion for a seamless, secure, and efficient financial journey. 

Download the app today to enjoy the numerous features and benefits Emirates NBD has tailored exclusively for you.

apps.title: Checkbook - Account Tracker
apps.description:
An easy & quick way to manage your daily finances, Checkbook keeps track of your credit card charges, cash expenditures...etc. With the Checkbook application, it can totally replace your paper checkbook. You can create multiple accounts, save recurring transactions, transfer funds, view reports & graphs, export data...etc. You can even search the transaction by crossing your finger on the calendar! All details of the Checkbook are well designed to provide an excellent experience. Designed and developed by polycents!

FEATURES 

※Export in CSV, QIF & HTML Formats 
-Export your transactions by email for use of desktop applications such as Excel, Quicken...etc. 

※Calendar 
-Show all your monthly transactions as points on the calendar. 
-Filter transactions by tapping a date or selecting multiple dates on the calendar. 

※Recurring Transactions 
-Save a transaction to be used repeatedly(daily, weekly, 2 weeks, monthly, tire monthly), without retyping all the details. 

※Multiple Accounts 
-Track as many accounts as you need. 

※Categories 
-Supports multiple categories with beautiful icons to choose from. 

※Payee & Note 
-All the details you need to keep track of your transactions are including. 

※Search 
-Quickly search for transactions by dates, name, payee, and category. 
-Search and edit transactions on the same screen. 

※Transfer 
-Transfer funds from one account to another. 

※Reconcile Transactions 
-Reconcile your transactions by editing cleared/un-cleared status 

※Reports & Charts 
-Review all your expenses & income by category or account with beautiful graphs and reports. 
-Supports both bar and pie charts. 
-You can set the time period to daily, weekly, monthly & yearly. 

※Passcode 
-Protects your private information. 

※Currency 
-Supports multiple currencies. 

※Elegant, Powerful & User-friendly interface 

# Subscription Details #
- Monthly and annual subscriptions are available.
- Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
- Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is disabled at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period.
- Automatic renewals will be charged at the same price you were originally charged for the subscription.
- Subscriptions can be managed by going to Account Settings on the App Store after purchase.
Terms of Use: https://www.iubenda.com/terms-and-conditions/42835851
Privacy Policy:  https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/42835851
Developer website：https://www.polycents.com

If you have any problems or suggestions please send a mail to checkbook@appxy.com, you will get the response in a short time.

apps.title: YNAB
apps.description:
Have you ever worried about money? You are not alone. 

Download YNAB, get good with money, and never worry about money again.

“We started YNAB January 1st with $37 saved and ended the year with $42,000. Plus we paid $14,000 cash for a new roof.”
-Kyle, YNAB user since 2020

Start your free one-month trial and stop feeling like you’re bad with money. 

“YNAB has removed the stress of money from my life and in doing so has helped make me a better husband. It's like I got to remove a personal flaw I had never been able to fix." 
-Kyle, again. We didn’t even pay him to say this, but maybe we should.

Why YNAB?
-92% of YNAB users report feeling less stressed about money since starting.
-The average user saves $600 in the first month, and $6,000 in the first year.

“A year of YNAB costs less than a massage and is a heck of a lot better for reducing stress.”
-Kat, YNAB user since 2016

Benefits and Features

STOP ARGUING ABOUT MONEY
…and start planning your life, together

-Create and share unlimited plans with up to six people with one subscription
-Real time updates between devices make it easy to keep everyone informed
-Cheaper than couples counseling

STOP DROWNING IN DEBT
…and start seeing progress with your paydown

-Make a plan to pay down debt by calculating time and interest saved with the Loan Planner
-Avoid new credit card debt with YNAB’s clever built-in spending categorization feature
-Enjoy the benefits of a debt-paying community and resources

STOP FEELING DISORGANIZED
…and start feeling totally in control  

-Securely link financial accounts to automatically import transactions
-Easily add transactions manually, if you prefer
-Ask Siri to update your plan or provide expense category balances on the go

START REACHING MORE GOALS
…and stop thinking your future is limited 

-Keep your priorities and goals in focus
-Visualize progress as you go
-Watch your net worth climb

START SPENDING CONFIDENTLY
…and stop feeling guilt, doubt, and regret

-Calculate your “Cost to Be Me” 
-Make a flexible, proactive spending plan
-Always know how much you have to spend

START FEELING SUPPORTED
…and stop feeling like you’re alone in this

-Talk to our “freakishly nice” award-winning support team (don’t tell them we called them freakish)
-Join workshops and attend live Q&A sessions
-Become part of our community of genuine, amazingly supportive people who get it
-Attend one of our live events to learn, share, play, and even get tattooed with like-minded getting-good-with-money people. (Seriously.)

The first step of never worrying about money again is starting a free one-month trial. Are you ready to get good with money? 

(You seem ready! And we already really like you, so please join us.) 

Free for 30 Days, then Monthly/Annual Subscriptions Available

Subscription Details
-YNAB is a one-year auto-renewable subscription, billed monthly or annually.
-Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
-Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
-Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
-Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.
-Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a
subscription to that publication, where applicable.

You Need A Budget UK Limited is acting as an agent of TrueLayer, who is providing the regulated Account Information Service, and is authorized by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (Firm Reference Number: 901096)

Terms of Use:
https://www.ynab.com/terms/?isolated

Privacy Policy:
https://www.ynab.com/privacy-policy/?isolated

California Privacy Policy:
https://www.ynab.com/privacy-policy/california-privacy-disclosure?isolated

raw_data.releaseNotes:
This one’s all about connections and clarity—between you and your spending, and you and your bank connections.

We’ve given the Manage Connections experience a refresh! You’ll notice some welcome upgrades:
• The option to nickname your bank connections
• Clearer connection statuses
• Handy visual cues showing which bank accounts are linked (and which are still flying solo)
• Bank logos for easier identification

And that’s not all: the Underfunded card on the Home tab is now tappable, so you can jump straight to your underfunded categories view.

We also squashed a bug that was causing layout issues when doing math in split transactions. Your split transactions should now behave—and look—the way they’re meant to.

apps.title: Cowrywise: Save & Invest Money
apps.description:
We are licensed by the SEC, enabling you to grow and manage your money securely. With direct access to the largest pool of mutual funds in Nigeria, you can save and invest at competitive rates, and build wealth at your own pace, in ways that won’t take the “style” from your lifestyle.

With the Cowrywise app, you can:

SAVE FOR SHORT AND LONG-TERM GOALS
- Start automated savings with as little as ₦1,000. Save every day, week, or month with our Flexible Periodic Savings Plan
- Save for your periodic needs - rent, school fees, gadgets, dream car or apartment, etc
- Earn double-digit interest - much better than you’ll find at your bank
- Save as a group to reach your goals faster with Circles
- Prepare for unforeseen emergencies by creating a personalized Emergency Fund

OWN A PIECE OF NAIJA’S TOP PERFORMING COMPANIES
- Naija, how market? The doors to the Nigerian Stocks Exchange are now open to you! Buy stocks of over 140 companies listed on the Nigerian Stock Exchange, right on the app.
- Get access to real-time data, business insights and historical performances of each company
- Get a visual snapshot of how the Nigerian Stock Market is performing through our State of the Market interactive heatmap. 
- Get actionable tips with our in-app stock mini course to help you on your Stock Investing journey.

INVEST AND GROW WEALTH AT YOUR PACE
- Invest in any of our mutual funds matching your financial goals and risk appetite. Mutual funds contain low-risk assets like Treasury Bills, bonds, or stocks
- Diversify your portfolio by investing in different mutual funds from top investment firms in Nigeria.

YOUR MONEY IS IN SAFE HANDS
- We are licensed by the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).
- Your savings are invested in low-risk financial instruments and are held by a custodian,  Zenith Nominees, a subsidiary of Zenith Bank Plc. This means your money is professionally managed and secured.

To protect your account, we have implemented security infrastructure such as PIN, two-factor authentication, and Security Questions. We comply with the National Data Protection Commission (NDPC) regulations to safeguard your data. Your BVN and bio-data are safe with us.

GET SUPPORT WHEN YOU NEED IT!
- We offer support through the app, phone, email, Facebook, Instagram, and X (formerly Twitter). If you need assistance with your account, we’re always here to help!

HOW IT WORKS IN 5 SIMPLE STEPS:
- Download the app
- Create your account
- Tap “Save” or “Invest”
- Follow the prompts to fund any of your plans
- Congratulations! You are now one step closer to a wealthier version of yourself.

Start planning for short-term goals, and long-term goals, and take control of your financial future.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
• Know where your money goes - see and track exactly how your funds are allocated in your Managed Portfolio.
• NG Stocks just got smarter - stay in the know with simple company summaries and dividend updates, so you never miss a payout or an opportunity.
• Introducing Cowrywise Kids - help your kids build money habits early through fun lessons and exciting games. Only for ages 5-17.

apps.title: Inter – Banking & Investing
apps.description:
Inter's banking super app helps you simplify your financial life with a full range of banking solutions—all in one app.  
Spend, invest in stocks, save with gift cards, and send money abroad directly from your phone.

Take control of your finances in a modern way and access services designed for your lifestyle.

Why choose Inter?

- Trusted by millions: More than 40 million people use Inter.  
- Your money is FDIC insured.
- Gift cards with cashback: Explore offers and deals from top brands.
- Physical & virtual debit card
- Inter Passport Credit Card
- Invest in stocks & ETFs from as little as $5.
- Global money transfers : send money to over 60 countries, including Mexico, Colombia, Brazil, El Salvador, Guatemala, Honduras, Ecuador.

And more:  

- 24/7 multilingual support: English, Spanish, and Portuguese.  
- Inter LOOP rewards program: Earn points to exchange for gift cards and other perks.  
- Get eSIMS for your mobile data needs.

Open your digital account and access all services in one place.

DISCLAIMER:

INTER & CO PAYMENTS, INC., doing business as Inter (“Inter”), is a financial technology company, a registered money services business (MSB) and a licensed money transmitter, not a bank (NMLS ID #907330).  Massachusetts Foreign Transmittal Agency (License #FT114374-100). Rhode Island Currency Transmitter (License # 20203960CT). Click here to access our NMLS licenses.

Banking services are provided by Community Federal Savings Bank (“CFSB”), Member FDIC and deposits are held by CFSB and Wells Fargo Bank, Members FDIC.  Inter is not a depository institution, deposits held at CFSB and Wells Fargo are not eligible for FDIC insurance.

The Inter US Checking account is provided by Continental Bank, Member FDIC. Inter US Checking accounts are FDIC-insured up to US$250,000. Inter US Checking account funds are eligible for FDIC insurance up to the allowable limit through Continental Bank, Member FDIC, and other program banks. Coverage is subject to aggregation of all of each account holder’s funds held on deposit at Continental Bank or at each of its program banks. Funds generated through Inter’s payment processing services are generally available in the Inter US Checking account balance immediately after a payment is processed. Fund availability times may vary due to technical issues. Inter is not a bank. Inter US Checking accounts do not provide monthly paper statements and do not issue physical paper checks. Inter US Checking accounts are not interest-bearing accounts.

FDIC deposit insurance coverage only protects against the failure of an FDIC-insured deposit institution. If you have an Inter US Checking account, up to US$250,000 of your balance may be covered by FDIC insurance on a pass through basis through Continental Bank, Member FDIC, subject to aggregation of the account holder’s funds held at Continental Bank and if certain conditions have been met.

Mortgage services are provided by Inter US Finance, LLC (NMLS ID #1161874), an affiliate of Inter & Co Payments, Inc.

Securities brokerage services are provided by Inter&Co Securities LLC, Member FINRA/SIPC , an affiliate of Inter & Co Payments, Inc. and a wholly-owned subsidiary of Inter&Co US Holding.  View important information and disclosures here.

If you have any questions or concerns regarding any transaction, please write to us at 501 Brickell Key Drive, Suite 202, Miami, FL 33131, or by email at help@inter.co or by calling us at 1-888-305-7264.

The Inter US Mastercard® Credit Card is issued by Continental Bank, Member FDIC, pursuant to alicense from Mastercard International Incorporated and may be used wherever Mastercard debit is accepted. DISCLAIMER:

INTER & CO PAYMENTS, INC., doing business as Inter (“Inter”), is a financial technology company, a registered money services business (MSB) and a licensed money transmitter, not a bank (NMLS ID #907330).  Massachusetts Foreign Transmittal Agency (License #FT114374-100). Rhode Island Currency Transmitter (License # 20203960CT). Click here to access our NMLS licenses.

Banking services are provided by Community Federal Savings Bank (“CFSB”), Member FDIC and deposits are held by CFSB and Wells Fargo Bank, Members FDIC.  Inter is not a depository institution, deposits held at CFSB and Wells Fargo are not eligible for FDIC insurance.

The Inter US Checking account is provided by Continental Bank, Member FDIC. Inter US Checking accounts are FDIC-insured up to US$250,000. Inter US Checking account funds are eligible for FDIC insurance up to the allowable limit through Continental Bank, Member FDIC, and other program banks. Coverage is subject to aggregation of all of each account holder’s funds held on deposit at Continental Bank or at each of its program banks. Funds generated through Inter’s payment processing services are generally available in the Inter US Checking account balance immediately after a payment is processed. Fund availability times may vary due to technical issues. Inter is not a bank. Inter US Checking accounts do not provide monthly paper statements and do not issue physical paper checks. Inter US Checking accounts are not interest-bearing accounts.

FDIC deposit insurance coverage only protects against the failure of an FDIC-insured deposit institution. If you have an Inter US Checking account, up to US$250,000 of your balance may be covered by FDIC insurance on a pass through basis through Continental Bank, Member FDIC, subject to aggregation of the account holder’s funds held at Continental Bank and if certain conditions have been met.

Mortgage services are provided by Inter US Finance, LLC (NMLS ID #1161874), an affiliate of Inter & Co Payments, Inc.

Securities brokerage services are provided by Inter&Co Securities LLC, Member FINRA/SIPC , an affiliate of Inter & Co Payments, Inc. and a wholly-owned subsidiary of Inter&Co US Holding.  View important information and disclosures here.

If you have any questions or concerns regarding any transaction, please write to us at 501 Brickell Key Drive, Suite 202, Miami, FL 33131, or by email at help@inter.co or by calling us at 1-888-305-7264.

apps.title: Plus500 Trading & Investing
apps.description:
Plus500 is a global leader in the trading arena. Make your entry into the world of Futures hassle-free and start trading futures on Bitcoin, S&P 500, Nasdaq, Oil, and More.
Whether you're a seasoned professional or making your first forays into Futures trading, Plus500's got the advanced features you've been looking for in a trading app.
Don't miss your opportunity to trade Futures with a Plus!

What you’ll love about Plus500:
•  Unlimited Demo Account to practice trading risk-free
•  Quick and easy registration
•  Powerful and reliable trading technology
•  24/7 professional support
•  Zero platform or market data fees
•  Low margins and trading commissions
•  Start small & diversify with e-Mini and micro Futures Contracts

A little more about us:
• We are proud to sponsor legendary U.S. basketball team the Chicago Bulls, as well as being the Main Sponsor of powerful European football teams such as Legia Warsaw and BSC Young Boys.
• We offer trading analysis tools free of charge.
• Account funding is available by wire transfer and ACH.

IMPORTANT: Trading in futures and options carries substantial risk of loss and is not suitable for every investor. The valuation of futures and options contracts may fluctuate rapidly and unpredictably, and, as a result, clients may lose more than their original investments. Market volatility, trade volume, and system availability may delay account access and trade executions. Past results are no indication of future performance. The trading of futures is available through Cunningham Commodities, LLC d/b/a Plus500 Futures Trading, a Futures Commission Merchant registered with the US Commodity Futures Trading Commission and a member of the National Futures Association (NFA ID number 0001398). Cunningham Commodities, LLC is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Plus500US Inc. Trading privileges subject to review and approval. Not all applicants will qualify. Information collected on account applications will be used to verify an applicant’s identity, as required under Federal law.
Office Address: 2 Pierce Pl, suite 200, Itasca, IL 60143

apps.description:
Say hello to Hiatus - the smart way to monitor your accounts, track your subscriptions and get control of your money. Our money saving app helps you achieve more in 3 easy steps:
 
1. Consolidate all your spending into one place
2. Track your financial activity over time and identify any bad financial habits
3. Use Hiatus’ tools and recommendations to save and earn money
 
Hiatus is designed to help you take your money further. In addition to helping you spend smarter, Hiatus uses cutting-edge technology to set up monthly budgets and identify rate increases. See how good it feels to have control of your money and to reach your financial goals.

apps.title: PNC Mobile Banking
apps.description:
Check balances & recent transactions – See current account activity for your checking, savings, credit card and loan accounts.

Protect your accounts – Set up Touch ID® or Face ID® to securely sign on to the app. Or, reset your password quickly and conveniently if you need to.

Send money with Zelle® – Send money simply, to people you know and trust (i) using your
mobile number or email address.

Transfer funds – Transfer funds between eligible PNC accounts and external bank accounts (ii).

Make deposits – Deposit checks quickly and easily with your iOS device (iii).

Pay bills – Add your bills and make one-time or recurring bill payments right from the app.

Manage your cards – View and manage your PNC credit, debit and SmartAccess® cards and make in-store payments with Apple Pay right from the app.

Lock your cards – Easily lock or unlock your PNC debit card or credit card if you misplace it.

Locate PNC – Locate the nearest PNC ATM or branch using our location services, or search by zip code and street address.


If you have Virtual Wallet®, you’ll have access to more tools and insights to help you work toward your financial goals.

See what’s free to spend – Your Scheduled Out subtracts known bills and expenses from your available checking account balance to show you what’s free to spend, which we call your Free Balance. You’ll also see potential Danger DaysSM, which is when your account is at risk of being overdrawn.

Visualize your money – Use Money Bar® to see how much is available to spend with your Free Balance, what you’ve scheduled for bills and how much you’ve set aside for goals.

Know your activity – Use the Calendar to see upcoming paydays and payments, and view a history of your transactions. You can pay bills, schedule bill reminders, track external payments, view potential Danger Days and more.

Track your spending & set budgets – See where you're spending your money with categories like restaurants, gas and more. Then, create budgets to know if you’re staying on track.

Make saving easier – Create savings goals to work toward your goals and keep track of your progress along the way. Set up automatic rules to regularly transfer money to your savings, like once a week or when you receive a paycheck.  Make saving fun using your personalized piggy bank to transfer money to your savings.

With PNC’s Security and Privacy, you can be confident that your personal and financial information will be protected while using our app.

(i) Zelle should only be used to send or receive money with people you know and trust. Before using Zelle to send money, you should confirm the recipient's email address or U.S. mobile phone number. Neither PNC nor Zelle offer a protection program for authorized payments made with Zelle. Zelle is available to almost anyone with a bank account in the U.S. Transactions typically occur in minutes between enrolled users.

If the recipient has not enrolled, the payment will expire after 14 calendar days.
(ii) There are limits to the number of transactions you can make from a savings or money market account per month.
(iii) PNC does not charge a fee for Mobile Banking. However, third party message and data rates may apply. Mobile Deposit is a feature of PNC Mobile Banking.  Use of the Mobile Deposit feature requires a supported camera-equipped device and you must download a PNC mobile banking app.  Eligible PNC Bank account and PNC Bank Online Banking required. Certain other restrictions apply.  See the mobile banking terms and conditions in the PNC Online Banking Service Agreement. Virtual Wallet, PNC SmartAccess and SmartAccess are registered trademarks of The PNC Financial Services Group, Inc. ©2025 The PNC Zelle and the Zelle related marks are wholly owned by Early Warning Services, LLC and are used herein under license. Face ID® and Touch ID® are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries and regions.

raw_data.releaseNotes: Thank you for using the PNC Mobile app. This update includes user experience enhancements.

Manage your banking from anywhere, anytime with the free Performance Finance mobile app. Sign in to the Performance Finance mobile app with the same credentials you use to log in to Performance Finance online banking.

Features include:
- Make a loan payment 
- Check your balances
- View transaction history
- Transfer funds between accounts
- Link your external accounts
- Set up and manage alerts
- Mobile check deposit
- Secure login with multi-factor authentication
- Log in with biometrics (Face ID and Touch ID)
- Get insurance with Lemonade
- Lower bills with Billshark
- And more…

apps.title: TBC Bank
apps.description:
Simplify your life with TBC's Mobilebank 

Experience banking fully digitally – simple, instant, secure. TBC’s Mobilebank offers various features to make your daily banking experience seamless – from customizing your homepage to activating products wherever you are, right from your phone. 

Become TBC’s customer in just 30 seconds. Register in Mobilebank without any documents by verifying your identity with just a selfie. 

Get your new TBC Card via Mobilebank and use it instantly. Earn on every payment, unlock exclusive offers across Georgia, and transfer your loyalty rewards straight to your account. 

Transfer money 24/7. Send money to someone else in TBC, to another Georgian bank, or from another Georgian bank to your account – anytime you need. 

Pay utilities and recurring expenses with just one tap. Simple, fast, and always at hand. 

Get a fast consumer loan in under 2 minutes. Access up to 80,000 GEL, with an effective rate starting at 18%. 

Open a deposit and move step by step, closer to your goals. Start saving today and move towards what matters. 

Choose how you want to pay with TBC Pay Later. Divide your payment into up to 4 months with a 0% effective rate. Get a refund for an already completed payment and split it into your preferred number of months. Spread the cost of your desired item over up to 36 months at a monthly rate of 1.5% (effective rate: 36%). 

Invest in more than 6,500 U.S. stocks. Enjoy $0 fees for trading, account opening, deposits, and withdrawals. Build your portfolio on your terms and invest across the world’s largest sectors and industries. 

Manage remittances digitally, 24/7. Send or withdraw money from home at any time and enjoy special exchange rates.

apps.title: Delta by eToro
apps.description:
Delta by eToro is your financial superpower – the best way to track your investments.
Take control of your portfolio with Delta, the ultimate investment tracking app. Whether you invest in stocks, crypto, ETFs, or forex, Delta gives you real-time insights, seamless syncing, and deep analytics to help you stay ahead.

▶ Built for Investors. Powered by eToro ◀
As part of eToro, Delta gives you a smarter way to track, analyze, and optimize your investments – all in one sleek, easy-to-use app.

▶ Why Choose Delta? ◀
▸ All-in-One Portfolio Tracking: Sync your broker accounts, wallets, and exchanges
▸ Reliable Market Data: Get real-time updates on stocks, crypto, ETFs, forex & more
▸ Smart Notifications: Stay ahead with instant alerts on market movements
▸ Investment Insights: Analyze gains, risk levels, and asset allocations

▶ Unlock Your Edge with Delta PRO ◀
▸ Deep Portfolio Insights: See your best/worst performers, risk profile & diversification
▸ Live Price Updates: Real-time pricing with no manual refresh
▸ Unlimited Connections: Sync all broker, wallet & exchange accounts
▸ “Why Is It Moving?”: Understand asset price changes in real time
▸ Insider Transactions: Get notified when corporate insiders make moves

▶ Invest Smarter with Delta ◀
Join millions of investors using Delta to track portfolios, analyze trends, and make data-driven decisions.

Download Delta by eToro today and take your investment tracking to the next level.

apps.title: Upgrade - Mobile Banking
apps.description:
Get easy and rewarding mobile banking all in one place! Request cash advances and open a high-yield savings account, check balances, pay bills, track cash back and manage loans, cards and more.
 
Upgrade is a financial technology company, not a bank.
 
-Track Rewards – Earn cash back rewards on Upgrade Card purchases³
-Manage Personal Loan, Flex Pay buy now pay later, Upgrade Card, Auto Finance, Auto Refinance and Home Improvement accounts. Make payments and check your balance.
-Sign up for Credit Health to monitor your credit score, get notified of changes, and use our simulator to see how different actions may impact your score.
 
Share feedback at mobile_app_feedback@upgrade.com
 
Personal Loan offers shown assume an APR of 12% and a term of 36 months for Faster Payoff and 48 months for Lower Payment. Personal Loan offers are subject to approval. For more information on Personal Loans through Upgrade visit https://www.upgrade.com/personal-loans/.

¹ Subject to eligibility. BoostCash™ amounts range from initial $25 to $500 over time. 10.00% APY and express delivery requires a $9.99/month Premium subscription. 1-month free trial for select customers. Cancel anytime. Learn more about eligibility and terms at http://www.upgrade.com/boost-money/eligibility.

² For Boost Money™ Save accounts, the 10.00% Annual Percentage Yield (APY) up to a $1,000 balance requires a Premium subscription ($9.99/mo). Balances over $1,000 with Premium earn 3.42% APY. Without a Premium subscription, the APY for the Boost Money™ Save account is 1.50% on all balances. The APY is effective as of 09/19/2025, is variable and may change at any time. Certain fees, such as outbound wire transfers or RTP, may impact earnings. Please refer to the applicable Cross River Bank Savings Deposit Account Agreement and Truth in Savings Disclosure.
 
³ Purchases accrue cash back when you pay them back. Certain limitations apply. See Upgrade.com for full Upgrade Cash Back Rewards Program details.
All loans, Personal Credit Lines, and checking and savings accounts are provided by Upgrade's bank partners (www.upgrade.com/bank-partners/). Upgrade Visa® Cards and Upgrade Visa® Debit Cards are issued by Upgrade's bank partners, pursuant to a license from Visa USA Inc. Upgrade, Inc. apps.title: FT中文网 - 财经新闻与评论
apps.description:
FTChinese is the Financial Times' Chinese language website, providing unrivaled news and information to China's top business executives and decision makers.
 
The FT’s international team of journalists has access to senior corporate executives and politicians both in China and around the world, making it a must-read for China's business leaders.

Starting from version 3.0, we have a totally new app. 
- Faster: after you successfully launched the app for the first time, later launches only take 0.99 second. 
- Cleaner: the redesigned app supports High Definition perfectly and get rid of all distraction so that you can focus on FT’s world-class journalism. 
- More Features: you can now resize, share, clip, use bilingual mode, switch to night mode, search for articles, check archives by day, watch video and see what’s hot. 
- My FT: you can subscribe content based on topic, industry, area and column.

About the auto-renewable subscriptions
1. Auto-renewal
Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. 

2. Price and Service
There are three subscriptions for the FTChinese iOS app: The Standard Anniual Subscription, the Premium Subscription and the Standard Monthly Subscription. The price for the Standard Annual Subscription is $28.99 per year. It unlocks exclusive articles and allows you to listen to English audio for bilingual articles. The price for Premium Subscription is $294.99 per year.It unlocks all the features in Standard Subscription, as well as a weekly magazine called Editor’s Choice.  The price for Standard Monthly Subscription is $3.99. It unlocks exclusive articles and allows you to listen to English audio for bilingual articles for a month. 

3. Payment
Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. 

4. Cross Platform
You can use the services on both iPhone and iPad. If you buy on an iPhone, you can tap the “restore my subscription” button on your iPad. And vice versa. 

5. Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
Privacy Policy: http://www.ftchinese.com/m/corp/privacy-policy.html
Terms of Use: http://www.ftchinese.com/m/corp/service.html
Contact: customer.service@ftchinese.com

apps.title: BILL AP & AR Business Payments
apps.description:
The BILL AP & AR app simplifies business payments and receivables for companies of all sizes. Whether you’re focused on accounts payable, accounts receivable, or just looking for an easy way to collect payments from a customer, BILL AP & AR streamlines tedious, manual processes—saving you 50% of the time spent paying and approving bills and helping you get paid 2x faster.

AUTOMATE AP AND AR
Streamline your processes to spend less time on payments in and out.

PAY YOUR WAY
Choose from a wide variety of payment options including ACH, international wires in USD or local currency*, virtual card, credit card, or check.

TRACK PAYMENTS
Get detailed information and real-time notifications about bills including payment status.

SIMPLIFY APPROVALS
Say goodbye to manual payment approvals and hello to approvals anytime, from anywhere.

MANAGE PAYMENTS IN ONE PLACE
See important action items—like pending approvals and payments—on one simple overview screen, so you’re always up to speed and on track.

*Initial vendor setup from your desktop is required before sending international payments using the mobile app.

If you're looking to manage spend and expense on the go with BILL, please download the BILL Spend & Expense app.

apps.title: Qonto - Business Finance App
apps.description:
Qonto makes day-to-day banking easier for SMEs and freelancers, thanks to an online business account combined with invoicing, bookkeeping and spend management tools. With an innovative product, highly responsive 24/7 customer service and clear pricing, Qonto has become the European leader in its category.

Master your daily finances with a powerful business account
	•	Local IBANS
	•	Payment cards: spend up to €200,000/month. No hidden costs. Pay online or in-store, at home and abroad: whatever the situation, our range of free and premium corporate cards included in your subscription has got you covered.
	•	Transfers: flexible payment methods - from instant SEPA to speedy international transfers - so you can pay and get paid faster.
	•	Get paid anywhere: accept payments in-store, on the move with Tap to Pay on iPhone, or online with Payment links. Enjoy faster access to funds with zero friction.
	•	Transactions: unlimited history and real-time notifications.
	•	Financing: simplified access to integrated financing options: apply in minutes for our partners financing deals or ease your supplier payments with our in-house financing offer, Pay later.

Unchain your growth with a suite of financial tools
	•	Invoice management: centralize invoices & receipts in one place; get paid fast and pay your suppliers even faster.
	•	Spend management: control team spending with budgets, automatic receipt collection & tailored access.
	•	Bookkeeping: collaborate seamlessly with your accountant by connecting them to our suite of tools; get a full, real-time cash flow overview.
	•	Cash flow management: track the journey of every euro, forecast cash gaps in the weeks ahead, and see VAT updates in real time; let your unified dashboard translate scattered financial data into an actionable business roadmap.

Follow Qonto for news and company updates.

See what our customers have to say about us at https://www.trustpilot.com/review/qonto.com

Olinda Head Office is registered at 18 Rue De Navarin, 75009, Paris, France.

apps.title: Tameed | تعميد
apps.description:
Instant Financing for government & corporate purchase orders  & projects performance bond up to 7.5 Millions
Tameed Platform is a Fintech company Licensed by the Saudi Central Bank SAMA.
Join Tameed Financing Platform now and have access to :
Instant Financing: Tameed supports SME businesses in Saudi by offering them financing based on government PO.
Investment opportunities with competitive returns of more than 15% net annually: We offer individual and institutional investors opportunities to invest in government backed purchase orders.

App Features: 
1- Request Instant Financing: You can get an Instant financing if you are a SME and have a PO
2- Investment opportunities with competitive returns and backed up by government & corporate Purchase orders.
3- Auto Invest: Feature that allows you to define your investment based on your preferences for future opportunities so that the application will alert you once the investment is accepted and you have 48 Hours cooling off period to cancel the investment without any cost.
4- Tameed Mokafa’a Points Program: Take advantage of your investment deposits in your wallet and get points from the Mokafa’a points program to increase your chances of participating in future investments.
5- (Coming Soon) e-commerce financing.
6- (Coming Soon) Expense Management Cards: We’ll facilitate the management of company expenses through Sharia-compliant company credit cards

Key Benefits for Investor?
flexible and short-term Investment
Investments are backed up by government & corporate Purchase orders
Attractive returns for investment opportunities
Compliant with Sharia Law as well as KYC and AML, CFT regulations
Very limited correlation to capital market performance
Auto Invest feature

Key Benefits for SMEs?
- On-demand purchase order financing solution. Choose when you receive purchase order. 
Immediate initial approval & Final Approval within 3 days
Flexible rates starting at 0.8%/Month with early payment discount
Off-balance funding

Approved and in compliance with Sharia Law
Tameed Platform is regulated and approved by the Saudi Central Bank (SAMA). We maintain the entire funding process in accordance with Islamic regulations and have been certified by the Sharia Review. We worked with Islamic finance experts and legal advisors to ensure that our financing solutions are based on the values and principles of Sharia law. 
solutions are based on the values and principles of Sharia law.

apps.title: Kuda - Free transfer & payment
apps.description:
Welcome to the money app for Africans!

Open a Kuda account today and join over 7 million people who use Kuda for easy banking, investments through a stock trading account, savings and on-the-go payments.

Kuda is the smart way to do your banking every day, pay, make free money transfers, invest and manage your money on your phone. Download the Kuda banking app, open a Kuda bank account on your phone, add money and request a Kuda Visa card.

Make banking easier for yourself. Get 25 free money transfers to any Nigerian bank every month, pay online and offline easily, invest and save money automatically. Download the Kuda banking app today to pay, save and invest!

Kuda is licensed by the Central Bank of Nigeria.

Why Should You Get Kuda?

- Open a bank account for free in minutes, start banking and pay easily immediately.

- Make money transfers to any Nigerian bank for free up to 25 times every month (Nigeria users only).

- Pay online and offline with secure payment options.

- Buy eSIMs to access the internet affordably in over 60 countries. (Nigeria users only.)

- Create a Kuda Username to make unlimited free money transfers within the Kuda community without a bank account number! 

- Set up a trading account on the app to invest in US stocks (Nigeria users only).

- Request a virtual and physical Kuda Visa card with pickup and nationwide delivery options. (Nigeria users only.)

- Save money easily with our automated savings features and get up to 8% annual interest! (Nigeria users only.)

- Pay across borders with money transfers to Nigeria from the UK at competitive rates. (UK users only.)

- Pay bills and buy airtime for all major networks. (Nigeria users only.)

Open A Free Account Now 

We know your money is important to you, so we won’t charge you unnecessary bank fees for banking with us.

Watch Your Money Grow

- Banking is more rewarding with Kuda! Save a lump sum or set a percentage to save periodically and we'll pay you up to 8% annual interest on your savings, so your money keeps making money. (Nigeria users only.)

- You can also save every time you pay directly from your Kuda bank account with Kuda Spend+Save. It's the smartest way to save! (Nigeria users only.)

- Invest in US stocks with a trading account. Trading services are provided by a third party. (Nigeria users only.) Disclaimer: Invest wisely! The value of stocks fluctuates and stock trading involves possible loss of capital.

- Pay subscriptions with gift cards for the top streaming services. Shop internationally and pay with gift cards for the most popular online stores.

Your Money Is Safe At Kuda 

- We know debit cards go missing sometimes, which is why you can block your card on the app (and unblock it if you find it).

- Banking is personal. Use Private Mode to hide your account balance from prying eyes. 

- If you need help, you can chat with us on the app or send a message to help@kuda.com anytime.

Switch To Kuda In Two Easy Steps:

1. Open your account: Download Kuda and open a Kuda bank account on your phone.

2. Add money to your account: Send money to your Kuda bank account from any other bank’s app or through internet banking or move money from your debit card.

For more information about Kuda, please go to kuda.com.

Spend smarter, save more and get the most out of your money with Kuda.

Download the Kuda banking app now to bank, save money, invest with a trading account and pay!

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Scheduled Transfers: We made it easier for you to find your saved beneficiaries so you can schedule transfers quicker.

Transfers: We made improvements to transfers.

Premium: We made it easier to see your cashback rewards on Kuda Premium.

Referrals: We fixed a few bugs to improve the referral experience.

apps.title: MetaTrader 5
apps.description:
Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.

TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels
• Support for push-notifications from the desktop platform and MQL5.community services

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
• 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

我们为您提供智能投资服务，以及沪深港美全球实时行情，精选股市热点资讯、基金理财等。投资全球，就用同花顺！

风险提示：投资有风险，入市需谨慎。

【亮点功能】
【√ 】涨停聚焦：涨停强度、市场情绪、连板天梯等，助您优选打板标的。

apps.title: Robinhood Credit Card
apps.description:
The Robinhood Gold Card is the only credit card you'll need, and it's exclusively for Robinhood Gold members.*

3% CASH BACK ACROSS THE BOARD 
- That’s right - earn 3% cash back on all categories**

SWIPE FREE FROM FEES
- No annual fee for Robinhood Gold members*
- No foreign transaction fees*

EARN 5% CASH BACK ON TRAVEL
- Book travel through the Robinhood travel portal and get even more cash back

SECURE ACCOUNT MANAGEMENT
- Track your spending
- Quickly report suspicious transactions
- Freeze and unfreeze your card at any time

TAKE CONTROL WITH VIRTUAL CARDS
- Pay with disposable card numbers for smarter, more private spending
- Choose one-time-use cards or recurring virtual cards for subscriptions

DESIGNED FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY
- Add cardholders of any age, so everyone can build credit
- Effortlessly track family spending, set spending limits, and lock lost cards instantly


Disclosures: 
Robinhood Gold Card is offered by Robinhood Credit, Inc., and is issued by Coastal Community Bank, Member FDIC, pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. Robinhood Credit, Inc. (RCT), is a financial technology company, not a bank. Robinhood Financial LLC (member SIPC), is a registered broker dealer. Robinhood Securities, LLC (member SIPC), is a registered broker dealer and provides brokerage clearing services. All are subsidiaries of Robinhood Markets, Inc. (‘Robinhood’).

Individual credit limits will vary by applicant and are subject to credit approval and underwriting. See if you’re approved with no impact to your credit score. Your credit will not be impacted unless you decide to accept the card offer.

Interest is earned on uninvested cash swept from your brokerage account to program banks. The cash sweep program and Robinhood Gold (subscription fee applies) are offered through Robinhood Financial LLC. Terms apply. Rates are subject to change. Robinhood is not a bank. 

*See full rates and fee details. The Gold Card requires an annual Robinhood Gold subscription to apply and maintain the card and does not include a 30 day free trial. Robinhood Gold is offered through Robinhood Financial LLC (RHF) and is a subscription offering premium services for a fee. RHF (member SPIC) is a registered broker dealer. RCT and RHF are subsidiaries of Robinhood Markets, Inc. (Robinhood).
**Some limitations or conditions may apply. Must have Robinhood Financial brokerage account to redeem cash back. See rewards program terms for details. Rewards program terms are subject to change.


Robinhood, 85 Willow Road, Menlo Park, CA 94025.

apps.title: Budget Burndown: Finance Kit
apps.description:
Budget Burndown is a simple personal finance app for tracking your monthly burn rate. Visually track your expected vs. actual spending rate across multiple cards on a single chart. If you keep the lines matched up, you're staying on budget. It's a quick and intuitive way to track your spending without all of the bloat that makes other budgeting apps so frustrating to use.

Budget Burndown is part of the Finance Kit suite of personal finance apps, which also includes Transactions.

• A VISUAL SPENDING TRACKER
Automatically track your spending against your monthly budget across multiple accounts. Add transactions manually when linking cards is not supported in the region.

• HOME SCREEN WIDGETS
At-a-glance visibility into your burn rate without even opening the app.

• SAVE TRANSACTIONS
Quickly save transactions when you want to remember to split a bill or expense a purchase later.

• CUSTOM NOTIFICATIONS
Create custom push notification triggers. Set alerts for when a transaction is above a certain amount or contains specified text.

• SECURE AND PRIVATE
Your information is completely safe. You'll use Plaid to link your cards. Your credentials are end-to-end encrypted and completely inaccessible to the app.

On the last day of each period, we'll renew your subscription for your Apple ID unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the period ends. You can cancel by going to your account settings on the App Store.

Terms of Service: http://www.ghking.co/modules/Terms-Of-Service
Privacy Policy: http://www.ghking.co/modules/Privacy-Policy

apps.title: Voya Retire
apps.description:
We’re passionate about making your life easier.


Download the Voya Retire mobile app to save in a snap

We’ve made it easy, intuitive and secure for you to save all in one place. The Voya Retire mobile app was designed for you – to meet you where you are – so you can help boost your retirement savings and manage your money all while on the go.


Power in the palm of your hands

You’ll have easy access to your retirement plan, health savings and investment accounts, smart learning tools, resources and more…everything you need to confidently take control of your finances – all in the palm of your hand.


Intuitive, interactive and simple to use

With its clean design and intuitive global navigation, you can quickly view your savings progress, update contributions and beneficiaries, transfer money or change investments and so much more….

Interactive tools allow you to simulate estimated retirement income using myOrangeMoney®, get help with live chat capabilities, educate yourself with on-demand video learning or get access to professional advice*.  


Save more, securely

We value your privacy and never sell your personal data to anyone – ever. We protect your assets with our enhanced encryption, biometric login, multi-factor authentication and our S.A.F.E. guarantee to keep your money safe and secure, while keeping you on track and coming back. 

Wherever life takes you, take the Voya Retire mobile app with you so you can retire well – with confidence. Simply tap the app to save in a snap.


*Professional advice is based on the plan’s options available to participants. 
For more information, please see the full S.A.F.E. Guarantee at https://www.voya.com/articles/safe-guarantee

raw_data.releaseNotes:
This release will include the following:

• Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

Like the Voya Retire app? Please leave a review in the App Store.

Problems or suggestions? Please email: VoyaRetire@voya.com

apps.title: Blaze Studio: Business Finance
apps.description:
Blaze Studio: Business Finance is a finance innovation studio for entrepreneurs. Whether you're launching your first business or strengthening your financial leadership as a seasoned founder, we give you the tools and education to lead with confidence.

FOR ENTREPRENEURS
Subscribe to Blaze Pro to access: 
-- Self-paced audio courses covering 30+ finance topics
-- Pre-built templates for budgeting, fundraising, and forecasting
-- B., your in-app assistant for on-demand guidance

FOR INSTITUTIONS
Universities, accelerators, chambers, and nonprofits can provide bulk member access to: 
(A) Finance Unplugged — Entrepreneur finance curriculum with facilitator resources
(B) Private in-app community channels for your cohorts and customized onboarding module for your organization.

HOW IT WORKS
Entrepreneurs subscribe directly in the app.
Institutions submit an inquiry via the in-app portal. Once approved, your organization gains access to tailored curriculum, embedded case studies, and cohort-specific messaging channels.

Built for learners. Trusted by institutions.

APP USAGE & SUBSCRIPTION
Blaze Group is free to download. Full access to the learning library requires a monthly subscription. When you choose to subscribe, you will be charged the price shown in the app. Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged within 24 hours prior to renewal. The current subscription period cannot be canceled. You can manage or cancel your subscription at any time in your settings.

INFORMATION ABOUT THE APP AND PURCHASE OPTIONS

By signing up, you will get access to subscription(s) that include features such as progress tracking, and offline sync.

The download of Blaze Studio: Business Finance is free of charge. No free trial offered. Should you use Blaze Studio: Business Finance app to access in-app content via available subscription(s), a payment will be charged to your credit card through your App Store account . A subscription renews automatically unless canceled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. There is no increase in price when renewing.

Subscription(s) can be managed and auto-renewal turned off in Account Settings in the App Store after purchase.

Read our full Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy:

https://passion.io/terms-of-service
https://passion.io/privacy-policy
